Reviews.Title: For under $50, Kodak does a great job.
Reviews.Author: WakkyWabbit

} } } Length:: 4:47 MinsArrived promptly, well packaged. No missing parts. Nothing broken nor scratched.I wanted a decent, cheap camera with a video function. Something that I could put in my pocket, leave in the Jeep and not be too distressed if it was stolen or broken. This camera, for the price, does a good job. Other reviewers have done an excellent job of combing over every detail so I will not repeat.For $50, it's going to be hard to find a camera that offers more than this one. So, although it is not perfect nor the best, the features for the price get this item 5 stars.I hope this video will give you an idea of what the camera looks like and some of its functions. Due to the length, I had to minimize the file size. I hope the detail is acceptable.For best viewing, click Full Screen, the X in the lower right hand corner, after the video starts.Thanks.If you want to see how this camera takes basic video in the lowest format(I had Movie Maker downgrade the video for Amazon review) use this Amazon link for my review of Wigwam socks: http://www.amazon.com/review/R1NZKNHDK8CQ6W/ref=cm_cr_rdp_per►Update◄I ordered in early May, it is now Sept 3rd. This camera continues to work well. It has taken some abuse being in my Jeep. I have put groceries on it, it hits the floor when I put on the brakes too fast and sometimes I leave the Jeep sitting in the sun. It has survived a 7 year old playing with it. I have dropped it more than once. I like using AA batteries.If there is one issue, and it's not a biggie, is that sometimes I must press the shutter button several times to get clear details on a closeup. Even my Canon SX50, Powershot and Lumix cameras have this issue....so, no problem, just the only negative I have noticed.

Reviews.Title: Decent, useable
Reviews.Author: ps181
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cheap, working, point and shoot camera with better quality than my old cell phone, and it works for that.  Aside from adjusting the exposure you may be frustrated with some of the seemingly technical options; white balance only has presets, and if you don't want auto focus your only alternatives are macro and infinity - no manual!  There is a simple mode and a "program" mode with more options, but the camera always defaults to the simple mode when you turn it on.Focus has been the most frustrating thing for me, because with night shots or close-ups, the combination of auto-focus with the motion of my hand pressing the button makes everything blurry every time.  I've gotten around this by using the 2-second timer and holding the camera still after I press the button.  If that sounds terrible, avoid this camera.Picture quality is decent.  It's not the 90s anymore and you could probably say that about any similar consumer grade camera.  14 megapixels seems like a lot less when you zoom all the way in, but close-ups turn out well (when you get them in focus).  Video is 640x480 and again, this isn't amazing, but I'd pick this over any old video camera simply because it doesn't record the sound of a videotape motor (plus digitizing tapes is boring and expensive).Does not come with a memory card, has a tiny amount of internal memory.  You can spend anything from $10-$100 depending on how much you want.  I got 4 GB for $10.The Kodak software - which is not included, you have to download it - is pointless.  The camera doesn't show up as a usb volume on Mac, but it works fine with ImageCapture, so you can install nothing, get the photos, and get on with your life.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for my needs! Modified from 5 to 4 stars
Reviews.Author: Nathan Kull "Nate"
Reviews.Content: What I needed:- A camera that would take good quality pictures for site surveys (Information Systems), I take pictures of building layouts, network closets, server racks, etc.- Needed to take AA Batteries, I keep this in my tool box and don't ever want to worry about whether or not my camera specific battery is charged.  I always keep my toolbox stocked with charged Eneloop batteries and the ability to use those was a must.- Needed to take standard SDHC memory card- Needed to be relatively small- Needed to be able to take pictures in low light situationsHow does this camera do with the above needs:- I have been able to take decent pictures, I have not had near as much issue with blurry images as I had with my last Sony camera, however I would not use this camera to get crisp shots of moving targets.  Some pictures have come out clean and crisp, yet others would leave a little to be desired.  (They DO work for my needs)- Low light situations are better than I have experienced with some other cameras, however due to the lower shutter speed you have to make sure you hold the camera very still or you will get blurry pictures ... I think this is pretty normal though.  The flash works very well, however if too close to an object you can expect some white out.- I was able to take pictures during the day of moving cars outside my porch (40mph speed limit)  ... I was able to get good crisp pictures of those moving vehicals during the day, at night they were blurry.  The flip side of this token is that taking pictures of still objects at very close range has tended to have a little bit of a blurry outcome (still usable for my purpose, however not as crisp as they could be)- The rechargeable Eneloop AA batteries have worked very good in this camera, able to take plenty of pictures with flash between changes of batteries. I have not tracked how many with / without flash, I will monitor that and post an update at another time. (To be safe, I always keep 2 sets of batteries in my tool box in addition to the set inside the camera)- The size is perfect, it's very compact, but it has a very large view screen on the back which comes in very handy when making sure I have good pictures.- Works very well with my Transcend 8GB Class 6 memory card, very fast writes to memory.Overall, I like this camera, it meets my needs, and I have no buyers remorse...  If you are looking for a camera that is going to take great family photos that you want to post on FB and print out for greeting cards, you might want to look elsewhere.Additional note, I got mine "used" from Amazon Warehouse in "Very Good" condition --- Could not tell that it was not new.** This review was modified from 5 stars to 4 stars on 4/11/12 due to pictures not turning out quite as I would have hoped as I continued using the camera, I have also updated the above review texts to take this into account.  Initially I was more impressed, however I still do not regret the purchase. **

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: parson
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to operate and takes wonderful pictures.  The sharing features make it easy to share pictures in the social media sites and to print pictures and do special projects with uploaded pictures.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is very nice, easy to hold, easy to shoot. I did have a problem with it which is probably an issue only with this particular camera, not all Kodak cameras. However, the download to be able to share your photos through the computer did not work, and the EasyShare cameras from Kodak are not supported any longer. I was not able to go online and get a download. Because I needed the camera for my part-time work, and that work included being able to download photos to a website, I could not use the camera. Amazon, however, was very generous in refunding the purchase price of this item.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "make learning an adventure"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  It's perfect for carrying in my purse as it takes little room and it is there for those "Kodak Moments" when I need it. Love my Kodak Z981 even more, but it's large enough that I have to carry it separately - and do just that when I know I'm going to be taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Norton
Reviews.Content: For the price, it's a good value.  It's small enough to fit in a pocket, doesn't take special batteries that can be hard to find, and reads chips much faster the Kodak Z740 that I had previous. Battery life is within the acceptable range, and since it takes two AA batteries, it's easy to haul extra.  Picture quality is pretty good for a point and shoot.  Took me a while to figure out how some of the features worked.  Still not a fan of how pictures are uploaded to the computer, although the load to facebook an flickr is seamless.  I got it as an interim camera to use until I can get the DSLR I want but will probably continue to use it both because it's so easy to stick in a pocket and carry with everywhere, and to help frame pictures with the bigger camera.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: S. Williams
Reviews.Content: Great camera. I had an older version of the same model but it was a bit too bulky for me to carry around in my uniform. I saw that the new model was sleeker and was very affordable. Highly recommend it as it takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good enoegh for the price
Reviews.Author: JimSR
Reviews.Content: The Camera is good enough for the price, not the best pictures in the world, but great quality anyway.Price-Quality is great.One of the pros, is that the camera in really simply to use, even when it has lots of options. Screen is great, battery life is great.

Reviews.Title: Happy with Unit - Great Camera for Digital Newbies
Reviews.Author: GatorMan
Reviews.Content: Got this for parents - digital newbies...easy to use..Great Quality.Would have gotten 5 stars if some of the buttons were a bit bigger or easier to push in.

Reviews.Title: This EasyShare camera is no longer EasyShare
Reviews.Author: Diana C. Cook
Reviews.Content: Kodak has discontinued the download and support that allows connection to your computer.I would like Amazon to include this information in their description. When an EasyShare camera no longer has that ability this fact should be highlighted in the description.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: brandybaby
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my 78 year old mother.She was able to learn how to use it quickly.Nice big screen to see your pictures.  Good for a childs first camera or an elderly person.Reasonably priced too !

Reviews.Title: Crock
Reviews.Author: Dr. Wil Burns
Reviews.Content: Amazon sells a camera that is no longer supported by the manufacturer. When the software to transfer pictures didn't work, I was left with a limited function camera. Thanks for nothing, Amazon and Kodak, not cool.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with camera, disapointed there is no kodak software.
Reviews.Author: Vernon Snapp
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the camera, but inability to download to a computer via USB cable was disappointing, and lack of Kodak software sort of negates the whole point of "easy share", as I have to remove the sd card and put it in my computer's slot to download photos. I feel this should have been made clear in the description. Also the full instruction manual was not included, I had to find it on the internet. I guess this is to be expected when you buy an orphaned product.

Reviews.Title: For the price, FANTASTIC.
Reviews.Author: Heavyarms55
Reviews.Content: The Cheapest Digital camera I could find at Best Buy was twice the price I paid for this camera. This is a pretty basic point and shoot Digital camera, but it's all I wanted, and I got what I wanted. I will be able to take this with me easily and take quick pictures with a much better quality than my cell phone or iPod. If you want a simple easy to use digital camera for a great price, this is it!Caution: I should mention that this doesn't come with an SD card. I already had one and didn't care, but if you don't have a spare you will need one. I think it has a little internal memory but it's designed to just pop in an SD card.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera. But Kodak has discontinued the sofware it uses.
Reviews.Author: Aaron Zielieke
Reviews.Content: This is a good cam takes great pics and has really good quality. The internal memory will only hold 3 pictures so you might want to consider buying a memory card for it right away. The only issue I had is there is a software downloader that starts when you plug the camera in but Kodak has discontinued the Easyshare software it tries to download so It will not download from them. you have to go to the Kodak website and download the "Kodak share button app" for win or mac from their website that will work with this camera once you get that taken care of it works really well. Just thought Id share that with potential buyers. It is a great camera for the money though.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: shoppercrazy30
Reviews.Content: Very good camera works great. Nice decent price for it. Takes very nice picture with good quality. Would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!  KODAK is bankrupt and there is no product support of any kind for this!
Reviews.Author: Lora
Reviews.Content: When I hooked it to my computer the software installation gave me an error.  Well, Kodak offers no download and no support whatsoever, not even FAQS!  Their message was that if I have already downloaded software I can feel free to continue using it!I now have a completely unusable product.  This was my 7-yr-old's big Christmas gift and I regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price, pictures, and features.
Reviews.Author: charles campbell
Reviews.Content: Excellent little camera, especially for the cost.  We needed a small camera that could fit in my wife's purse.  Because of the price we weren't expecting too much as far as quality of pictures or features but this delivers big on both counts.  We couldn't be happier.  Now we don't have to lug our Nikon around everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great find.
Reviews.Author: babs
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome, the pictures are clear and the colors are so vivid. Its easy to use. I like the black color. Only bad thing is i cannot load my pictures onto my computer, but if I was able to it would have been easy thanks to the camera

Reviews.Title: cheap but ok for the money
Reviews.Author: jerem agent
Reviews.Content: the badI had some software problems getting pics off it onto my PC, it started braking on a camp out. I got sand in it and it would not turn on and the zoom broke. you might be able to find something better. but I will keep it as a cheap camera to use and abuse.the goodfixed the software problem. I got the sand out and now its working fine now. zoom and all. it came with rechargeable battery's and a recharger that lasted a 11 day trip in witch I took 700 picsif you want a cheap camera for your kids to have, or your self. if it gets broken or lost it its not a big deal, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: howdydoo
Reviews.Content: I needed a quality digital camera at a good price before taking a trip to Berlin.  I took a gamble on this and I'm very pleased with it.  I especially like the panoramic option, where you can take 3 pictures from one side to the other and the camera automatically stitches them together.

Reviews.Title: Broken on/off switch
Reviews.Author: sandy wilcox
Reviews.Content: The on/off switch doesn't work, I can't find a phone number to contact the seller.........I had it looked at, and the the person at the shop said it was defective..............it's almost like it has a short in the connection

Reviews.Title: Does What it Says!
Reviews.Author: Kerry Archer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an easy-to-use camera that took good pictures and didn't cost a fortune. This Kodak camera fit the bill.  The pictures download easily to my laptop so I can post them on Facebook with no trouble.  The only shortcoming is that the camera itself holds only 7 pictures, so I bought additional memory for a small price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Roger S.
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera and I was needing something to take picture to put a few items on Ebay and also just take some picture of friends and family, My only issue was with windows 8 software it took a little while to get the camera to link up to the computer and if anyone else has this issue go to Kodak website and download the right software for your system and it will work fine but if you try to use what is loaded in the camera it will not work at first.

Reviews.Title: Good camera inspite of no softwear available for sharing feature
Reviews.Author: Fredric
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures. "sharing" photos onto my computer was difficult due to no Kodak software available anymore, but with help of computer geek friend, was able to complete. Overall though, liked the camera.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: The Bugby
Reviews.Content: This camera is horrible. I bought it in November and by January it already broke, the lens won't come out. Didn't drop it, nothing but take pictures.. Is it any wonder Kodak is going out of business?

Reviews.Title: picture
Reviews.Author: eacosta
Reviews.Content: I took better clear pictures using my GS4. I am returning the item. it was not worth the money I spent

Reviews.Author: TJ Bailey
Reviews.Content: I bought this way ahead of time to give as a christmas present.  It works great except for the sound...that doesnt work...and i was not able to return because the time window closed before christmas got here.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware!
Reviews.Author: David Kounter
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son.  It's been a good buy, right until he filled the camera up with pictures and I had to download them to make room on the camera.  We use Windows 7 - and Kodak DOES NOT SUPPORT WINDOWS 7!!!  Are you kidding me?!I went to the Kodak site to see if there was updated software, and received this message:  KODAK EASYSHARE Software is no longer available as a download.  We no longer provide live support (phone or email) for EASYSHARE Software.  We regret any inconvenience to you.Fortunately, I work in IT and was able to make a Windows XP VirtualBox machine to get the pictures off it (not easy), but for the average user, that simply isn't an option.If you have Windows XP, then you will not have a problem with this camera.  If you have a SD card reader, you won't have any issues either.  BUT!  If you have Windows Vista or later you *will* have problems retrieving your pictures.

Reviews.Title: This is my headline
Reviews.Author: MDLA
Reviews.Content: Have to go online for information that is not included in brochure.  Seller didn't respond to my questions, but went to camera store and it is working fine now.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share Digital Camera.
Reviews.Author: Kelly J. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: This is a really great camera, it takes great pictures and videos, however, I wish that the camera had a speaker on it so you would be able to hear the video instead of on the computer.

Reviews.Title: Great Service, Great Price, Perfect Product
Reviews.Author: Don Hand
Reviews.Content: For the price, can't beat it, and the Kodak C1530 Digital Camera does what I needed it for..take pictures. I could use my phone camera but I needed this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Feliz2014
Reviews.Content: The color and the ease of taking photos. The camera came with additional accesories. Makes a great gift for any occasion!

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Rachel Thomae
Reviews.Content: My daughter needed a cheap digital camera for a high school class.  This one was affordable.  It's easy to use, and she's gotten some good photos with it, too.

Reviews.Title: Great even for kids
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Jahn
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased the Kodal Easycare camera for my 10 year old daughters birthday. It was an amazing deal with great megapixel rating and even at 10 years old how fun is a digital camera. For $50 you can't pass this deal up! I would have loved a digital camera of my very own at 10 years old!

Reviews.Title: Has windows 7 problem.
Reviews.Author: Patricia White
Reviews.Content: Sadly it doesn't work with Windows 7. Otherwise it is a very good camera. Takes great pictures. I don't have 3more required words.

Reviews.Title: Easy To Use, Adequate Quality
Reviews.Author: ReaderHal
Reviews.Content: Since I am somewhat camera techtarded, I wanted one which is easy to use, without tons of extra bells and whistles, just for taking pictures of family, and of audio items for uploading at various internet sites.  Ease of use is more important to me than ultimate image quality.  So is price.  I am very happy with this camera, for it met all these hit-points.Easy to use.  Yep.  Adequate image quality.  Yep.  Affordability.  Yep.I ordered mine in white because it was cheaper, and it came with rechargeable batteries and a charger!  Several folks have posted that they had to buy those items, and recommended doing so due to short alkaline life in use.  So... I don't know... try the white.  The charger and batteries came in the same Kodak box with the camera, with special dividers which made it obvious it all came that way from Kodak.  Anyway, white saves a couple bucks, looks just fine, and you might get the same kit I received, with batts & recharger.  Apparently they don't all come that way, judging by comments in these reviews.  Good luck.Be sure to order an SDHC memory card, because the internal camera memory only holds four or five pics.  I chose a Sandisk 4GB SDHC card at $5.  I don't even mess with Kodak Easy-Share or the USB connector to hook the camera to my PC.  It's a lot easier just to pop the mem card out of the camera, insert it into my PC's card slot and there are the pics.  No software to mess with... Windows already had what I needed to view, edit and upload to internet sites.  Works easy for me, so for anybody.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent, high quality point and shoot camera that is very inexpensive as Kodak is no longer manufacturing digital cameras. The camera uses inexpensive AA batteries, and uploading photos is very simple. We bought 8 of them for our students, and are very happy.

Reviews.Title: Love all over again!
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I got this camera in red for Christmas of 2010 and it was amazing and durable. It had everything I needed to take amazing pictures as my daughter grew. My daughter played with this camera, threw this camera and tried to eat this camera and somehow it managed to live for almost 3 years! It is a great camera for the price and that is why we are buying the exact same one again. I can't wait to get it in the next couple of days!!

Reviews.Title: Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: Gail Miller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 5 year old son's birthday. He wanted a camera and he's to that age where he didn't want a "baby" camera. It's fairly inexpensive and he is taking amazing pictures!

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Kress
Reviews.Content: The software to put the images on the computer cannot be dowloaded fro Kodak anymore.  The images were not as high-quality as I would have liked and I have returned the camera for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Great simple-to-use point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Ponch
Reviews.Content: My daughter got one of these 2 years ago. She accidentally dropped it, somewhat breaking the battery door, but the camera still worked so she rigged it to still hold the batteries in. We bought her a new one so she didn't have to fuss with the battery door and the new one works great. Great camera for a teenager or younger kid that wants to play around with digital pics or for the casual picture taker that has simplicity in mind.

Reviews.Title: excellent point/shoot camera
Reviews.Author: J. J. PIERCE "watch man"
Reviews.Content: i replaced a very expensive/overly complicated fuji camera with this one, good move! wife and i are seniors and this simple camera produces excellent pictures every time. good flash, plenty of simple to use features. easy to down load pics to my computer with supplied cable! light weight, comfortable to hold and take pics. excellent buy at under $50.00!!! if you want good pics in a simple high quality camera THIS IS IT!!

Reviews.Title: can't get service from blueproton (seller), amazon or kodak
Reviews.Author: onepaone
Reviews.Content: perfect inexpensive camera if it would work.  view finder went black and no longer takes photos.  however, still have camera info showing.  blueproton, the seller through amazon, does not accept ANY returns for ANY reason after 30 days.  bought this on june 28th for my grandson who took a trip and got back a few days ago, 40 days.you can't even contact blueproton or amazon directly about it and kodak's help line doesn't work.we just pi$$ed away $50 but it won't happen twice.  i will not buy any product from amazon that is sold by blueproton and will buy less from amazon.what service when there is NONE?  save your money and buy locally.  even walmart would have exchanged the damn thing which is all i want.you are better off to go to walmart or target since you're only saving $5.

Reviews.Title: vacation saver
Reviews.Author: Sharon787
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a back up and saved our vacation as the primary camera. Traveling abroad it was great to only need AA batteries with us to charge the camera and not risk missing great shots due to a dead battery. High quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: jessica locklear williams
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome and has helped me take pictures of my family. i really like this camera thanks for the camera

Reviews.Title: software is not supported for windows 7 or 8
Reviews.Author: Brian D Newnan
Reviews.Content: If you have a modern computer, forget about finding a driver for this camera. Kodak is not supporting it, and the Kodak software was not apparently updated for Windows 7.  So much for the "Easy Share Software"/  Only under pressure did I get a driver for the camera.  Good luck for the rest of us.  The camera is made in China by a contract mfr, not American made.  To be fair, America can not make cameras.

Reviews.Title: good deal for the money
Reviews.Author: katherine somma
Reviews.Content: I thought it was a good deal for the money.Nice color too.would recommend to anyone as a first camera.thanks alot

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Literati
Reviews.Content: I loved how simple it was to use. Not a GREAT camera, but definitely a good one! I used it at an anime convention and 99% of my pics turned out great

Reviews.Title: New Camera for Grandpa
Reviews.Author: Jerry C. Byrum
Reviews.Content: this was a present for my wife's father for Father's Day and his Birthday. he loves the camera. he has never had a digital camera before and he loves it. would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Didn't seem to work
Reviews.Author: Cori
Reviews.Content: I opened the package and tried to take a picture but the button wouldn't press down.. so unless I'm that technologically challenged, it didn't appear to work. I sent it back and they refunded me.

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: jollyka
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay, the pictures are okay. It is what it is. There is no share software available which I was not aware of. I needed a camera in a hurry and didn't do my homework. You can obviously take out the card and put into computer but would have been nice to been able to just share onto sites or emails.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.  Great price.
Reviews.Author: The Smiths
Reviews.Content: This is an easy to use camera that I purchased for my eleven year old.  She takes great pictures and also uses it for video.  Great camera.  Great price.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: M. Lanham
Reviews.Content: Bought for 9 year old. Simple enough to use, has more features the little one can learn. Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good value and a very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Sexy P
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14 year old son and he loves it. It is very easy to use.  I just wished it came with a rechargeable lithium battery that you plugged in.  I am still happy with my purchase. Thank you for the fast shipment.

Reviews.Title: Great Non-professional Camera
Reviews.Author: cherrychapstick87
Reviews.Content: First and foremost, I am impressed that this product arrived so quickly. I wasn't expecting it until days later.The reason I purchased this camera was because my old Kodak Easyshare M883 recently went kaput. I decided to stay with the brand and get a similar model, and I believe that I made a great choice. The pictures are very clear for being a simple point-and-shoot device, the features are easy to navigate, and it has a lot of updated features that my older model didn't have.I was not aware that the camera came with batteries, a wrist strap, and a USB cable, so that was an unexpected bonus. If you're looking for an inexpensive, non-professional camera, I definitely recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: first camera for daughter
Reviews.Author: Tag
Reviews.Content: This is her first digital camera and she loves it.  It takes better pictures then my camera and has a better display screen.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Cali4yaokie
Reviews.Content: I choose this because the price was cheapIs easy to use, and the size is compact for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera does a wonderful job..
Reviews.Author: gina hayden
Reviews.Content: Brought this as a gift it works wonderful. pictures are so clear perfect camera for a new Mother.Just as decribed..

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Sharron seibert
Reviews.Content: Works great! No issues not hard to use. Got this my fiance for our anniversary and he loved it! It's much better than the ancient one he was using lol.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use!
Reviews.Author: Shaz
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my father who is 70 and new to digital cameras. He wanted something simple, cheap and good and this one fits the bill. Its very easy to use and doesnt have too many fancy buttons and the price is very good considering its a Kodak and it clicks very good pics. I  wanted to trade my 2009 Sony with this one, but my dad wouldnt have it!

Reviews.Title: Simple, Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Sylvia L
Reviews.Content: I am really pleased with this inexpensive camera.  I wanted one that was so simple that even I could use it...just point and shoot.  The pictures turn out great.  Since I've only had it a month, I'm hoping I'll say the same thing a year from now.I also have a much more expensive Olympus digital that I never seemed to master...it's just too complicated for me.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: B. L. Weaver "Be yourself; everyone else is t...
Reviews.Content: When, I bought this camera, I wasn't actually expecting too much.  I was pleasantly surprised when it worked very well, and took great pictures.  The only thing about it is it runs on 2 AA batteries.  I consider this a good and a bad thing.  I recently took it on vacation, and I was glad to know that I didn't have to worry about it dying on me during the day; I just changed the batteries. :)  Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck Herget
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it works perfect nothing bad to say about it, I recomend it well worth the money, very easy to use :)

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: GDawg
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kodak EasyShare C1530 14 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red) as a gift for a first time camera user.  She is afraid of all technology and has quickly adapted to the ease of use with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: Lyrical Diva 62
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product, easy to use, fantastic pictures.  Superior quality and easy to manage size. Highly recommend anyone to purchase this product.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Danny Roberts
Reviews.Content: The camera works find but u have to get a memory card to keep your pictures in. the camera came very fast in only a few days.Very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: TAKES BLURRY PICTURES!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my 11-year-old son who is his Boy Scout troop's photographer because my Kodak EasyShare Z760 is to hard for him to turn on and off.  The Kodak EasyShare C1530 is easy to use, just turn it on and click but all his action photos come out blurry.  My husband then tried to take some pictures himself but again they turned out blurry.  We ended up with 259 blurry pictures of the boys bowling.  It does take okay pictures of non-moving things but don't let the 14mp fool you, my 6mp Kodak EasyShare C1530 takes better photos.  We are very disappointed!!  Although it is very easy to use, I would not recommend this camera; you would be much better off spending a little more money and buying a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work correctly.
Reviews.Author: Erica Ali
Reviews.Content: The camera shipped to me must have been a faulty one, because whenever I tried to snap a picture it would completely crash (or otherwise turn off without warning). It would also randomly crash whenever I left it on for longer than 5 seconds.The camera shipped to me also has a broken pixel on the LCD screen. A minor issue I can honestly deal with, but it's kind of the icing on the cake in this situation!It's unfortunate, but you have to expect terrible quality when a 14 MP camera comes priced below 50 dollars. :) Do yourself a favor and spend your hard-earned money on something much more reliable.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530
Reviews.Author: James C. Groves
Reviews.Content: This product failed.  Although attractively priced and having the Kodak label it just didn't make it.  I bought this camera to replace a Kodak Easyshare DX 7440 so I have familiarity with the Kodak product lineKodak EasyShare C1530 14 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red).  This camera would not take close-ups - even Photoshop wouldn't clean up the blurring. It did not handle light well - when comparing shots I had taken with the DX 7440 of the same subject, the comparison was not even close.  For kids it may be a great starter camera but for even a casual user it is a waste of money.  I returned this item and appreciated the no-hassle return.

Reviews.Title: Batteries overheated in the camera while it was off.  Need I say more?
Reviews.Author: Christine Northern
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in April of 2012 (there's a reason they only guarantee these things for a year).  After a few months I was having trouble with my computer recognizing the camera when I hooked it up to the USB port.  The miniUSB port on the camera became loose and eventually the piece that allows you to hook the cord into the camera broke off and fell inside of it.  So then there was the piece rattling inside the camera every time you moved or tilted it.  I was annoyed about that, but I was willing to chalk that up to rough use on my part.  After that, I bought a little USB SD card reader, so that if I wanted to download anything to the computer I would take the memory card out and put it in the reader and get my pictures and video off that way.About two weeks ago, I bought brand new 4 pack of Energizer lithium ion batteries, which is what I usually use for the camera, and when I put the first two batteries in, the camera did not respond at all.  Didn't say the battery was low and shut back off, nothing.  As though there were no batteries in it.  I switched them every which way in case I had them in wrong.  At that point I concluded that the camera just crapped out and I needed to by a new one.  About a week or so later out of desperation, I tried the final two batteries on the off chance they would work and the camera fired right up.  A week or so after that, the camera was non-responsive after that.  And again, this was not a case of drainage after too much use-- there was no low battery indicator as I was familiar with seeing, the camera just didn't respond.Well, there was a chance that the pack of batteries I purchased was itself faulty, but as I didn't want to shell out a good $10 for a second pack of 4 lithium ion batteries in less than a month, I bought a cheaper pack of 6 regular Duracell batteries.  I thought the worst that could happen was that the batteries just wouldn't last as long, but mentally I didn't want to do the exact same thing and have the exact same thing happen again.  I put the Duracells in the camera that night and used the camera as normal. No more than for about 5 minutes consecutively.Well today, I was sitting on the couch, and my camera just so happened to be laying there next to me (in the Kodak camera case that I also purchased-- and works fine:) and I noticed that it was a little warm.  At first I thought it was from my body heat but I started to suspect that it was a little too hot for that.When I removed the camera it was hot to the touch on the side where the batteries were. I opened it, but of course didn't want to touch the batteries and I couldn't tell if they were swollen.  I shook the camera and the first battery fell out onto the coffee table.  The plastic had shrunk from the heat and the metal was exposed.  I shook it again a few times and the second battery bounced off the table onto a box of cookies and is now stuck to it by the melted plastic, hanging diagonal on the side of a box of cookies.I did a google search about perhaps average batteries used in high capacity electronics ever causing an overheat, but everything I researched simply suggested what I initially thought-- which is that it just drains those batteries faster.  There were a few things about digital cameras overheating, but that was only for when they were actually in use for long periods, and this camera was powered off.  I can only conclude then that the problems that I have been having are not with the batteries, which have been consistent up to now, but with the camera.When I bought this camera last year, I paid about $70.  I won't say that it was a waste of money, but it was a very expensive 1 year camera rental.  In light of the other reviews, I can only deduce that I got one of the "duds," the 0.3% of the product that for whatever reason, is just faulty.  This year I have a 2 month old son, and I'm one of the poor people that doesn't use a smart phone just a basic one, so it really sucks to be without a camera right now.Next time I will be choosing a different brand altogether, and make sure I stay within the current price point b/c this is all a bit too painful.

Reviews.Title: iti might be fine, but it DOES NOT WORK WITH MY computer and I think this should be warned
Reviews.Author: Katya "NYCAmberLady"
Reviews.Content: I mean what is the point? If you have a camera and can't empty the pictures someplace. I have windows 8 and it is incompatible, and maybe I missed it, but I didn't see that warning.  The batteries were hard to put in, battery cover, insert area feels like junk. but I had another easyshare and  iwas happy with it so thought I'd take a chance.it is good looking and not expensive. so what.

Reviews.Title: Kodak c1530
Reviews.Author: Vyuzai
Reviews.Content: I intentionally searched an inexpensive digital camera with AA-size batteries in view of sad experience of impossibility to make something on trip with cameras that use specialized batteries. This is a really important advantage.After 2 weeks of trial I can say that it is convenient and simple to use device ensuring fairly good quality photos for its price.The possibility to make panoramic photos works surprisingly well. Focusing is acceptably fast.  Other regimes fairly well correspond to the intended purpose. Series of two shots is also a useful function, which can really help to avoid such situations  when exactly at the moment of taking the picture somebody closed eyes, made another unintentional motion, etc. The automatically taken second image often helps to avoid this.Sensitivity and zoom are not exceptional, but their parameters are clearly indicated and anyway they also are acceptable in most cases.Actually the difference of its 14MP from newer models with 16 MP (by <15%) is not important at all. This is not like old 2MP and 4MP where the difference was 100%.I have not found important, but initially hidden drawbacks.Overall, I'd definitely recommend this model as a good inexpensive  point-and-shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare C1530 14 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (White)
Reviews.Author: Raymond Bibbs
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare C1530 14 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (White) is a great camera indeed.  it's easy to learn how to operate and shows such a pretty and clear picture and the colors are so life like.  The video is great and it is easy to share on the internet by way of email etc.  If you need a digital camera i strongly suggest the Kodak EasyShare C1530 14-MP and you will love it too!!RB

Reviews.Title: Not Worth The $$
Reviews.Author: Missy Nelson
Reviews.Content: This camera seemed really nice online, but when I received it in the mail, I was surprised to see that it is actually mostly plastic (not metal). When there are no batteries inside, it actually feels like a thin, plastic toy. The zoom was the worst. I tried zooming in on an object in the room- the item looked closer without the zoom than with it. For the price, you could find a much better camera out there. If it had only been half the price, maybe I could have considered it to be a good buy. Now, I'm having to pay to return the item just so that I can get a camera that works. I wouldn't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Easy share
Reviews.Author: Bettina barwick
Reviews.Content: This is such an easy camera to use, its fun and its great pictures. Its easy to share to my computer. Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera...
Reviews.Author: Molokaicreeper "maccentris"
Reviews.Content: We've had several Kodak cameras in the past few years, which usually would cost us a bit more than brands like Fuji, Vivitar or Olympus.  This camera is not a toy, or a piece of junk.  I was lucky enough to get this one under sixty bucks.  Although I am highly disappointed about the Easyshare software no longer supported at all, it is still a no brainer to pop the SD card into my laptop's port and copy the pictures without much effort.The Kodak quality will shine here, although don't expect commercial quality photos, but for the price these cameras can capture wonderful moments from graduations, to weddings, to baby showers, etc and you can even record video with sound.  You can't go wrong with that, my previous camera was a Fuji, that would mess my video sound really bad.  I am very satisfied with this purchase, my next camera will be a Kodak for sure.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Chitoiu
Reviews.Content: It broke after 3 days of use. Kodak does not support it anymore. The return window has passed (got this as a present for my mom more than a month ago).

Reviews.Title: Simple to Use
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: I got my camera just two days after I ordered it on standard shipping. It comes with a set of batteries, a USB cord, and a battery charger device. Things such as SD card and camera case are to be bought separately.The first thing I thought was that it was broken because once I put the batteries supplied into the camera it did not turn on at all. I traded them for Lithium AA and it worked fine.It's simple to use, very easy to figure out the settings and for the price it's a really decent and good looking camera. I went ahead and got an SD card to help with memory storage and transferring pictures to my computer. I'm satisfied, regardless of the battery annoyance.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Prillwitz
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a gift for my nine year old granddaughter. It has worked out well forher first camera.

Reviews.Title: Works better than a $300 camera. Seriously.
Reviews.Author: Rachael Myers
Reviews.Content: I bought a $300+ Nikon Coolpix camera. It had great reviews here on Amazon. It was a TERRIBLE camera. I'm a pro photographer, and all I'm looking for is a camera to capture candid moments where I don't need to bring my big camera. The Nikon was a huge flop from the first pictures taken. I returned it. I bought this Kodak Easyshare for my 3 year old daughter's birthday - and from the get go, I could tell it trumped the other camera by far! I'm amazed! Is it perfect,heck no. Is it sufficient for capturing moments, yes!! It actually focuses on what I want it to. I'm not unhappy at all with my purchase. It runs on batteries, so that stinks. But again, this was bought for my toddler. And instead, I've been using it hahaha... good camera!

Reviews.Title: gift for 8 year old grandson
Reviews.Author: napafollower
Reviews.Content: My 8 year old grandson loves his new camera. Just get a data card for downloading the pictures onto computer. For a first time camera user it does the job. His older brother now has camera envy so see another purchase in the future.

Reviews.Title: very nice Kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: This camera (Kodak C1530) was bought to replace one that had broken when dropped.  It's very easy to use.  Takes great photos and uses 2 AA batteries.  I would recommend it to people who don't want a complicated camera but one that is simple to operate.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Kodak Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Pauline Allain
Reviews.Content: for the money,,, it's perfect... It's simple to use, I don't like all kinds of gadgets.... it's perfect for me. It meets my needs and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: affordable digital cam
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: value is great for this camera, all the reviews are true-great picture quality and even came with rechargeable batteries and a charger for it and a usb cord.

Reviews.Title: The pictures turn out nice and she can send them directly from the camera
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Schloeman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a gift for my granddaughter.  I also gave her a battery charger and chargeable batteries, as the reviews I read said the batteries run down fast.  She loves it.  The pictures turn out nice and she can send them directly from the camera.  I'm glad I bought it.  I'm thinking about buying one for me.

Reviews.Title: so easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sharon Wikel
Reviews.Content: Love this easy camera.  This is my third one, not because they don't work but because I gave them to others as gifts.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Crystal Renaud "Author of Dirty Girls Come Clean"
Reviews.Content: Besides the camera being awesome, I didn't realize the actual battery charger for the rechargeable batteries came with it as it doesn't list it in the description. I had actually bought one in addition to the camera because I knew I needed one. Pleasantly surprised to see it included. Now I have two chargers. One for home and one for on the road. Such a great value overall.

Reviews.Title: Great looking camera
Reviews.Author: Kittypots
Reviews.Content: I love the vibrant color of this camera and more importantly, it takes great pictures.  I also like that it's not too small nor too big and is easy to find a matching case for it online. I haven't used the video yet but hopefully it works well too.  Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice all around Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark T Bartsch
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this camera, I was skeptical. I bought it for my spouse. She loves it. I would highly recommend this camera over more expensive cameras. It is worth every penny & then some.

Reviews.Title: good pictures
Reviews.Author: Page S.
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, easy to use, & to carry. I do have trouble with the sharing part. haven't figure out how to do it yet.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: redneckgirl45308
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best...I love how the pictures turn out...I also love how clear the pictures are and how well the sound is for the video

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Carmen Gutierrez "CG"
Reviews.Content: Very simple, easy to use. Good quality pictures for someone who just like to shoot good pics without bothering about technicalities.

Reviews.Title: birthday gift
Reviews.Author: homenurse5
Reviews.Content: Our Grand-dtr is very happy with her camera...... It felt great getting her a tried and true Kodak! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I am really in love with this camera. It is very easy to understand and use. Easy to set up and use right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: great affordable camera
Reviews.Author: ShanteLashay
Reviews.Content: takes really good pictues but kodak dont have the installation CD anymore So i'll have to find another way to upload the pictues to my computer

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera!
Reviews.Author: Linda Strevy
Reviews.Content: I really do like this camera.  I'm still learning how to operate it and take advantage of all it can do take excellent pictures.  The only thing I am not used to (as compared to my last digital EasyShare camera) is its small size and VERY light weight!  I don't dare use it without wearing the wrist strap.  This is not meant as a complaint...the more I use it, I get used to the "smallness" of it.  Thank you very much.Linda B. Strevy

Reviews.Title: Camera meets it's purpose
Reviews.Author: J. Larry Taylor
Reviews.Content: The camera was received in a timely manner.  It fits the needs of our granddaughter.  Time will tell but for now the camera is doing everything that is required of it.  It is an easy point-and-shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Janna
Reviews.Content: I bought this before my trip to Ukraine in September.  It did a great job - very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Nakeesha
Reviews.Content: Had a silver one like this before ,but it fell and got damage.I am real please with this product,will be order again.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Dale Bagley
Reviews.Content: I missed the docking that I had with my old version of this camera.The megapixals were quite high and met my requirements

Reviews.Title: Okay Camera
Reviews.Author: susan smith
Reviews.Content: This is one of those times that you get what you pay for.  It's a good starter camera for anyone. The video aspect could be much better! I took it to a concert and was super disappointed at the quality of the video. Like I said, it is decent camera for the beginner.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Johnny Guzman "J"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this cam with  SanDisk 16 GB Class 4 SDHC Flash Memory Card SDSDB-016G-AFFP  and they both work great,Thank u so much!

Reviews.Title: kodak c1530 (red)
Reviews.Author: maryannd
Reviews.Content: was the best gift i brought for myself and now i am going to learn to using it on the website for my friends to see my pets and family and other friends on my site... finally i did it..... so then it is great to buy yourself a treat once a month ...sometimes it would be nice to show yourself that you love yourself sometimes... makes a good gift for any occasion.... give it a try....

Reviews.Title: Back up
Reviews.Author: Homer dog
Reviews.Content: I did not need the  camera and in fachave only inspected it and not used it.  I bought it as a back up to a similar earlier model of what appears to be the same camera.  I bought it because  it is difficult to find a small camera powered by  disposable batteries rather than rechargeable ones.  The battery feature I consider of the greatest convenience.  It does use them up quite  rapidly but that is a small price to pay for the convenience of always having it available if you keep a spare  couple of AA cells with it. The reason for the down grade is that the controls are much smaller and the  camera lacks an eye level view finder.  It will do  but just barely in the event  my other  breaks.

Reviews.Title: Improvement over previous cheap cameras
Reviews.Author: rastaman "reggae ambassador"
Reviews.Content: The 32mm lens is a big improvement and the sensors allow much shorter wait periods between shots.Simple too, like most cameras in this price range, but all most people will ever need.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Julie L. Furgason
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cheap light camera to carry around, this is perfect! Batteries last a long time, takes great pics, Settings not too complicated, which I love!

Reviews.Title: I love my new camera.
Reviews.Author: Connie Kramer
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera. I was pleased that the pictures are excellent quality. Not all pixilated like I was expecting. It stores many more photos on it's little memory card than all my rolls of film together.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: David F. Schrader
Reviews.Content: Takes very high quality photos and very easy to use. Compact and a really sharp color. High quality product, I would recommend this!!

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Cleaning Lady
Reviews.Content: This camera was given as a gift.  It seems to be a very nice camera.  Pictures have turned out well.  Very little instructions on the use of the camera included with the camera.  There is a website to go to, but would have liked instructions included

Reviews.Title: Great camera for those not tech savy
Reviews.Author: Marylou Writer
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera for my husband as he is negative zero tech savy.  I had purchased one for myself a year earlier and he showed an interest.  It is basic but still has a lot you can do with it and still get great pictures.  I would recommend this camera to anyone who is just interested in taking great pictures with the simplicity.  Fits great in a pocket or small purse.

Reviews.Title: KODAK C 1530 DIGITAL CAMERA/Short battery Life
Reviews.Author: Richard Tynes
Reviews.Content: Canera works fine but uses batterys @ fast rate. have to keep a spare set along at all times. 3 Stars.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Calop
Reviews.Content: I bought it for a lady friend at Christmas and she use's it frequently. Takes quality pictures and easy to download to pc. Even though they said they were getting out of the digital camera business and no longer support it, I got it at a reasonable price and found it to be a good choice. Even with that said, I still expect and received quality from kodak.

Reviews.Title: Much better than the C875
Reviews.Author: Grcoeeg "longtime reader"
Reviews.Content: I love this little jewel, it is newer and much more efficient in battery life than the C875 that stopped working several months ago. I'm just a point and shoot camera guy, This model might be outdated, but it is new to me and I would buy it again right now if this one vanished. Price wise, it is a keeper and a winner.

Reviews.Title: This was a present
Reviews.Author: mytai
Reviews.Content: great little camera for the money really like it works great does the job and very affordable and cute too

Reviews.Title: I Like it...
Reviews.Author: William David Woods
Reviews.Content: I Like the camera a lot. Too bad Kodak, has choosen to stop production on their cameras like this. Second one I've owned and no problems and great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good affordable product
Reviews.Author: arlene m gray
Reviews.Content: Small, easy to use, compact--particularly great for travel.  I actually carry this camera in my purse all the time.  Once when I was backing out of a parking spot my back bumper touched the front bumper of a car waiting to get into my space; the other driver called the police, and I whipped out my trusty Kodak to take photos--there wasn't even a Dent on either car--just a quarter-sized piece of paint missing from both--and I gave the photos to my insurance company.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Ana K.
Reviews.Content: Gorgeous, i love it , nice color, its so beautiful  and good quality so great. (Hermosa camara exceletentes MP muy buena calidad , el color es exacto al de la foto lo recomiendo)

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: MARY MEAD
Reviews.Content: THIS LITTLE CAMERA IS SO GOOD AND COMPACT TO USEIT TAKES GREAT PICTURES.  I CAN TAKE IT ANY WHEREUPLOADS GERAT TO THE COMPUTER

Reviews.Title: Just the right size
Reviews.Author: Karen Fife
Reviews.Content: Just the right size, easy to use and fits in your pocket, takes great pics and easy to down load on to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great quality
Reviews.Author: Tracey Landes
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality for my 10 year olds first camera! I steal it from time to time to get pictures and I love the quality of the images. I would recommend it for all ages.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Y. Hathaway "YvoHath"
Reviews.Content: very easy to use decent camera for every day pics small easy light cheap for the money and takes nice pics worth getting prints

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Lamb "Busy Parent"
Reviews.Content: Great Value, cheap enough for the kids - eat batteries - stock up on rechargeable ones - but we'll turn the kids into photographers yet!

Reviews.Title: It is what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Reinaldo Flores
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, just point and shoot.My wife like it a lot and due to its size she can handle it very well.

Reviews.Title: bought for me
Reviews.Author: michael rodgers
Reviews.Content: bought this camera so I could take before and after pictures of the things I fix at work.  it was cheap enough that if it breaks im not going to get upset

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna C. James
Reviews.Content: We are not photo fanatics or techies, so this was the perfect camera for us.  Easy to operate and view photos.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Dropped one, bought an identical replacement
Reviews.Author: Stephen Fleming
Reviews.Content: The perfect cheap-and-cheerful pocket camera. Takes better pictures than my iPhone, and runs forever on two AA batteries. They'll never make any more, so buy one while they're still cheap.

Reviews.Title: KODAK IS STILL VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: AL
Reviews.Content: So far the Kodak camera is taking very nice photos with clarity. The functions are still to be learned, but I'm very pleased. I hope Kodak makes a comeback because I have a good history with their cameras and photo paper.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Rochester
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought for my 13 year old.  She uses it for the school yearbook.  It's easy enough for her to take quality pictures and upload them to the computer.  It's a great, sturdy camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon digital camera
Reviews.Author: Photo Dave
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son, who is using it for family and friends events.  For the money it is exactly what he needed.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Ernest Tyler
Reviews.Content: This camera eats the batteries.  Besides that it is a great camera for what we use it for, which is taking before and after photos for home remodels.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: daniel b.
Reviews.Content: CAMERA WORKS GREAT AND TAKES GREAT CLEAR PICTURES.  WOULD RECOMMEND TO EVERYONE FOR AN INEXPENSIVE DIGITAL CAMERA. A+ + +

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: David Lee
Reviews.Content: this camera works like a pro and u can send pictures wireless to a icloud account..and to facebook and other stuff.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after a week
Reviews.Author: Amanda Heeren
Reviews.Content: For the first week this camera worked really well, then it stopped working.  It looks like it is starting to turn on but just shuts back down.  Had bought a warranty but still have not heard back from the company after months of correspondence to them.

Reviews.Title: Kodak camera - a walk down memory lane
Reviews.Author: Glenna Hastings
Reviews.Content: Having grown up with Kodak products, I didn't think twice before ordering a simple Kodak camera for my 3 year old granddaughter. She is very smart, and rather than waste money $50 to $60 on a TOY camera, knowing full well that I would be able to teach her to use the kodak..  She is interested in picture taking and the instant satisfaction these new digital cameras offer is so exciting to a little kid...they don't rememeber loading film like we had to..This camera is the right size, a delightful color and simple to use, it fit all categories I was interested in, and it is also cost effective to use.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: LadyMun "Shop-a-holic"
Reviews.Content: I've never been more disappointed with a Kodak camera than I am with this one; it won't hold a charge; I've always owned a Kodak but now I t think it is time for a change.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: gave it to my mom for Christmas and she loves it!  It is small enough to carry in her purse.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: Camera is very nice, good quality when you get the right light, i dont like how it only takes batteries though, but i put rechargable batteries in and it has lasted longer then the regular batteries, and you do have to use a specific kind of batteries so please read the label under the door to where the batteries go very closely.

Reviews.Title: dear old Kodak
Reviews.Author: Christine Sowell
Reviews.Content: I loved my old EasyShare and wore it out.  With this trim little upgrade, the screen on the back is bigger, better quality, there is virtually no learning curve, and the photos are crisp and nice with hardly any fussing.  I'm so happy to have my camera back!

Reviews.Title: Good, simple camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey F. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my retired in-laws to use on vacation. They aren't very technologically-savvy but the controls are dead simple to use and they caught on very quickly. Hard to beat for the price.

Reviews.Title: wish I hadn't bought it.
Reviews.Author: AUDRA S RORICK
Reviews.Content: I cannot even down load the pictures I take onto my computer because it doesn't tell you in the description that you have to purchase separate stuff to do that.  I don't even use the camera because we live 45 miles from the nearest store to download them.  Wish I could get my money back on this one.

Reviews.Title: my son loves his camera
Reviews.Author: Rick Love
Reviews.Content: My son loves his new camera. The camera has great pictures clarity. Camera has nice color. It was nice to pick what color my son wanted.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a good camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas because he wanted a camera.  I have no idea if it still works or if he even uses it..or lost it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy L.
Reviews.Content: Liked the camera takes good pictures  but lens will not close. Something inside of it will not let it close all the way.Nancy Lee

Reviews.Title: Gift for mom!
Reviews.Author: Amalaruns
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mom, but so far she enjoys the camera. There is nothing more I can say.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Camera
Reviews.Author: Gerald Walsh
Reviews.Content: I had this camera before and gave it to a friend overseas.Happy to find a new replacement.Quick shipment by the seller.A fine camera with the convenience of AA batteries.The rechargeable batteries and charger that came with the camera were an unexpected bonus.Takes geat pics, SD card makes it easy to transfer pics to a computer.

Reviews.Title: Great First Camera!
Reviews.Author: Grammy
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 6-1/2 and 8 yr old grandsons!  Very easy for them to use and has lots of features that they like!

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Jean C. Petit "Happy:)"
Reviews.Content: The price and quality is GREAT!!  - Son in law said it is a cheap camera.  I Love it!!  pictures come out clear - I would highly recomment

Reviews.Title: Stopped working few days later.
Reviews.Author: Carol Payne
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift in November. I bought it in August. I was not able to return it. It will suck batteries with a few uses! I was disappointed. I tried getting help to fix it, but they wanted to charge me for over the phone help!!

Reviews.Title: It's nice, but batteries don't last long
Reviews.Author: Patricia Roach
Reviews.Content: wish it had a rechargeable battery pack so I can plug it in and charge it. It messes up a lot and decides to shut off on it's own or go to a black screen

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: kghyde38
Reviews.Content: Got it for what I needed it for. It takes great pictures and works well. No easy share support anymore but oh well I probably wouldnt have used it anyway

Reviews.Title: Koak C1530 Camera
Reviews.Author: Marg
Reviews.Content: It is really a very nice camera.The color is really pretty. I bought it for my 18 year old granddaughter and she really enjoys it.It was an excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera that we got for such a great low price.
Reviews.Author: Tracy Garcia
Reviews.Content: We were lucky to catch this on sale for around $50 and it is the most amazing little camera for that price.  We bought it for our 7 and 9 yr old girls to share.  It takes good quality photos and movies.  Can't get any better for that price.

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: S. Hutek "Shelia"
Reviews.Content: I love the color but had a hard time understanding how to work it.I hate not getting a simple manual I can understand with the thingsI buy.  Older people don't automatically know how to work a newgadget and companies don't seem to provide the kind of servicewhich encourages them to buy their products. The pictures do notcome out perfect-so don't expect it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the purchase.
Reviews.Author: Kaguya Clan
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a basic good camera, something that will get the job done. STOP STOP LOOKING ELSEWHERE BUY THIS!

Reviews.Title: Easy, good camera, sturdy
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: Like it, it is easy to use, lots of features, good picture quality and very durable. I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Karin Gandy
Reviews.Content: REALLY ENJOY AND LOVE  THIS AWESOME PRODUCT, THE PICTURES COME OUT SO CLEAR. THIS PRODUCT IS A GREAT BUY, AND  I RECOMMEND  CUSTOMERS TO  BUT THIS AWESOME  PRODUCT,

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Scott R. Groepper "scooter"
Reviews.Content: Nice compact camera. The pictures are good quality at 14mp. Easy to use and for the money I don't think you can beat it.

Reviews.Title: no good.
Reviews.Author: norma jean buckley
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my husband and it did not work right. I then ordered a Nikon which is great!

Reviews.Title: Camera Does Not Work. Will Not Power On.
Reviews.Author: A. Phillips
Reviews.Content: The Camera will not power on.  Totally usless. This was a gift and now Im going to have to get it from the recepient in another state. One big pain. Buying next camera at local Walmart.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: John Cross
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price.  Had issues downloading the pictures as the software would not load to my puter.  Finally had to change settings in camera to use 'other' software and then it worked.  Besides that everything is fine

Reviews.Title: First Camera for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Tisha Trice
Reviews.Content: This is great! Easy to use, nice picture quality. The ability to take high res movies is a great add too. She has loved it.

Reviews.Title: Very good deal
Reviews.Author: Florance Brazell
Reviews.Content: Given to my 10 year old grand-daughter for Christmas and she loves it.  Easy to use for her and any beginner to digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Should come with SD card
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good photos. I bought it for my 11 yr old for xmas. That said, the internal memory only holds like 6 photos so if you keep taking some it makes you delete others or just overwrites them. You MUST have an SD memory card for this camera. I would have also preferred a rechargeable battery instead of AA for her but the price/quality ratio couldn't be beat for her first "serious" camera.

Reviews.Title: bought it as a gift...
Reviews.Author: Charley "Charley"
Reviews.Content: my daughter loves it... she had an older one that was 12 megapixels.  She said video quality is diminished if you are too far away from your subject.  The picture quality is great for the price.  The color is beautiful.  It is quieter than the older Kodak easyshare she had.

Reviews.Title: Nice pictures
Reviews.Author: S. Dearolf
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 78 year old grandmother.  I talked her into going digital after many years of using disposable cameras. I was surprised at how clear the pictures are. It really is very simple use. Would definitely recommend as an inexpensive point and click.

Reviews.Title: Good camera-poor documentation
Reviews.Author: PastPrime
Reviews.Content: When I attached the USB cable to the computer, I got an error message.  I was about to give up and return the camera when I noticed on the LCD that I had the option of disabling EasyShare.  I tried that; then my installation and file transfer to my computer went smoothly.  The camera itself is very nice and takes good pictures.  If it were not for the initial problems and poor documentation, I would have given it a higher rating.

Reviews.Title: camara
Reviews.Author: happy
Reviews.Content: bought it for my bf and he loves it thank you he takes a lot of pictures now and very Happy w it

Reviews.Title: Documentation/instructions VERY poor
Reviews.Author: Cassandra
Reviews.Content: Manufacturer's documentation/instructions are very poor, so I have to call a friend to show me how to use.That is not Amazon's fault. It's Kodak's.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare C1530 14 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Harris
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera and wonderful value ($50 when I purchased it.) It's a shame that Kodak stopped making digital cameras. Be aware that Kodak no longer provides software but it is quite simple to transfer the photographs to your computer using an SD card. It was adequately packaged and seller shipped very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Very Good for the price!
Reviews.Author: P. Zbiegiel
Reviews.Content: For daily general use it is very good, very comfortable, has good battery usage. The pictures it takes are very good for being a basic point-and-shoot, with good quality. The zoom is good, it works well in bright lighting and dim lightning, and decently well in darkness.Be aware there is a second-long lag between the initial anti-red-eye-flash and the actual picture-taking, so don't move the camera after the first flash after pressing the button.Also, remember that the camera does not come with a SD card so be prepared to get one so you're not unprepared when the camera comes.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: steve utley
Reviews.Content: this was a Christmas gift. He absolutely loves it. very easy to use. he has already taken a lot of pictures and said the quality is excellent. thank you

Reviews.Title: Great camera for young or old
Reviews.Author: edneyvillefather
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter on her 7th birthday. We are tired of the cheaper or "kid style cameras" that always break or are of poor quality. This camera came with good reviews and an acceptable price. My daughter absolutely loves it. She can take pictures, put labels on them and organize them all right there on the camera. It seems sturdy enough to withstand some abuse and still keep taking great pictures. I would definitely reccomend this camera to anyone, whether they are 7 or 77.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a competitive price
Reviews.Author: Alessandro Catorcini
Reviews.Content: The camera is quite OK. I don't need the fancy features (sharing), but the camera is better than an average phone to take pictures on the go. It's nothing astounding but it does its job.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Enigma
Reviews.Content: Great camera easy to use lightweight. The pictures it takes are great. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a small easy to use camera

Reviews.Title: Can not get Computer to accept my photos.
Reviews.Author: Eva G. Troncoso
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine, but can not get my pictures onto the computer. Have done everything but stand on my head. I installed the software...... did not help.  I so wanted the photos for Christmas....How can I get my pictures into the computer.  Thanks in advance... Eva Troncoso

Reviews.Title: No software support
Reviews.Author: D. T. Warterian
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my sister. She took family pics on Christmas with it, when she went to upload the pics the software did not install. I found out Kodak no longer supports the software. I returned it for a refund. lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mater
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my son and daughter in law for Christmas and they loved it. absolutely great camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LIL DIGITAL
Reviews.Author: NYN8TV ""TJ""
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my dad to use for his hobby of making little houses. He's 83 with arthritis, but he manages to make these amazing homes with small bricks and tiles and windows and they are incredible. With this camera, which is simple for him to use, he can photograph his projects and place them in emails, etc. to share with others...or even to advertise to sell.

Reviews.Title: I like this camera.
Reviews.Author: Brian J.
Reviews.Content: I am thoroughly enjoying the C1530.  The image and video are very sharp, and its size make carrying it around easy.  It is loaded with features tailored to a wide range of photography situations.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera (White)
Reviews.Author: Melisa Elzey
Reviews.Content: It is perfect, exactly what I wanted to get my daughter for her birthday. It came right away, my daughter loves her new camera.

Reviews.Title: kodk c1530 digitiql camera red
Reviews.Author: lolly
Reviews.Content: at first I did not understand how it worked.  then I discovered that the memory card did not come with the camera and I did not take your suggestion of buying one at the time of purchase.  I know now and it takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: This is a great little digital camera...
Reviews.Author: MovieFan "CCinAustin"
Reviews.Content: for the value and money.  This makes the third one I've purchased.  I obtained it on sale for $59!  It provides great head shots or close ups that I need for a variety of reasons.  Can't ask for more at the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen B. Janecka "kay"
Reviews.Content: It didn't come in a box, nor did it have any paperwork with it, no instructions, but the price was right!  I didn't like the black, but a little pink fingernail polish and some fancy work helped me to find it.  I always lose BLACK.  As far as the instructions went, I went to Utube and they gave me instructions.  Pictures, so so, but I think it is the person taking the pictures.

Reviews.Title: compact digital camera gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: Joan C. Williams
Reviews.Content: I had a EasyShare camera before and misplaced it.  I simply love the camera. I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Ronda S. LeBlanc
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my mother for her birthday. She is enjoying it very much. The prices for her to get her film developed were outrageous so I figured this was a great gift.

Reviews.Title: This is the second one I  have purchased
Reviews.Author: Hey Mumser
Reviews.Content: My wife used this model for years and I bought  her this new one, same model because  the adaption period of time looked to me, and her that an earlier model by Canon that I bought from Amazon, was frustrating her with the new buttons she had to learn to use.made her appreciate  the older Kodak.. so  we returned the  Canon for credit and bought this one.. Now she's  happy... and  the camera works very very well..I now use her older  Kodak  and she has the new red one....We're both happy!

Reviews.Title: It just takes good pictures.
Reviews.Author: Andre La Plume
Reviews.Content: 14 MP, ease of use, size, view screen, and the price all combine to make a great little camera.I like when you can buy a device and it does what you need it to do without trying to cram it full of functions. Does what you need it to do.

Reviews.Title: NICE PIC !
Reviews.Author: PePe
Reviews.Content: love this cam, great picture, video, the price is right and I can't wait for it for the price to be lower so I can get more for Christmas gifs

Reviews.Title: Software problem
Reviews.Author: Carole Velardo
Reviews.Content: I could not get the software to load on my laptop and Kodak no longer supports the software so I was stuck.

Reviews.Title: BEWEARE Not for Windows 7!!!
Reviews.Author: Eaton "meimom"
Reviews.Content: No download program for installation of transferring pictures from camera to computer.Went to Kodak site and no download available for windows 7!!!Amazon was very courteous about giving a refund!

Reviews.Title: wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Bette M. Beegles
Reviews.Content: The camera is just what I was looking for, small, compact, fits in my purse, easy to use, I needed that. I took iton a bus trip, and snapped away everywhere the tour went.Other cameras I have had were too complicated for me.I am a senior, so anything that you don't have to look up directions all of the time is my cup of tea.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: Rita Sigrist
Reviews.Content: I am so thrilled with my EasyShare Kodak camera.  It has the easyshare button which makes putting pictures on the computer so easy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: James Garrigus
Reviews.Content: Compact, llight, and does a great job as a general purpose camera. The screen is a bit hard to see in bright sunlight but many other cameras have that issue. I highly recommend it, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: I like Kodak
Reviews.Author: Christine Cribb
Reviews.Content: We had an Easy Share Kodak for around 10 years and it always took great pictures so when it died recently we chose the camera most like it we found.  Had got the first one at Wal Mart, but they only had one Kodak a higher priced more involved type so ordered what we wanted online.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price!!
Reviews.Author: C. B. Martin
Reviews.Content: Cool little camera for the price, takes decent pics and I use it for work so it helps cover my butt. ( repo guy, in a way )

Reviews.Title: Decent for light, amateur, or around-the-house use.
Reviews.Author: John C.
