Reviews.Content: It is ok for what I use it for, just around the house, not professionally. I think this may have been a clearance model, thus explaining the low price I paid. If you just want a similar Kodak model for rather light use, this is ok.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Fast Eddie "Fast Eddie"
Reviews.Content: This does the job fine and is good for a child - pretty robust so can take a bit of punishment - pictures are pretty good too.

Reviews.Title: software wouldn't load.
Reviews.Author: Kelly B
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift and returned it.  The camera worked, but I can't speak to the quality because when I plugged it into the computer to upload the pictures, the software wouldn't install.  I tried repeatedly and got the same error over and over.  I tried on a brand new laptop after it wouldn't work on my older computer and got the same exact error.  I went to Kodak's website to contact them and in doing so saw something indicating that EasyShare software has been discontinued....yet this was using EasyShare software, so you're still selling them why?  And I sent Kodak a message to ask if they could help me because I wanted to love this camera.  This was replacing a similar Kodak that I've had for 7 years and is starting to go.  I also have another wonderful Kodak that is too bulky for keeping in my purse like this one.  I've been a Kodak fan, but this just wouldn't work.**update:it's been a month since I contacted Kodak and still have not gotten a response from them!  I found my EasyShare software disc to install on my new laptop so that I could use my old Kodak until I get a new camera (the picture software that came with the laptop is really basic) and it installed, but wouldn't work once I did.  I clicked help to find out what was going on and found many, many messages stating that they no longer support or offer any assistance with EasyShare software.  Which, begs the question of why they are selling them???

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my parents after finding out that my dad had dropped his camera when he was visiting and it was unworkable after it happened. Once my husband and I found out this happened we were in search of a new camera to give to my parents for Christmas. We know they love metallic red and the color was a no brainer...but my husband had one at work that is the same as his one and absolutely loves it and loves the clarity of the pictures and said how well it worked and my parents would like the one he used at work to use in their private lives. We looked it up and here it is. I'm just hoping this is simple enough so they don't have many buttons to push and too complicated so they can't get the full enjoyment out of it. Looks like it is simple enough and will write a continuance once it is given and they have had a chance to try it out! It sure is a good looking camera and hope it works just as well! I'm anticipating there will be no problems and their camera problems will be solved!

Reviews.Title: Nice and simple
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: Good simple camera. if looking for something in this price range - I recommend. The white color is nice. Shaped for easy handling. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Kodak no longer supports the EasyShare software
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: The EasyShare software is no longer available for download or supported by Kodak.  We bought this as a gift for my mother-in-law to easily share photos on facebook. However without the accompanying software, the camera is not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Unquestionably a piece of complete and total crap.
Reviews.Author: tkgsingsct
Reviews.Content: It's obsolete. There is no support whatsoever from Kodak for this camera, and getting the software download to run it is essentially impossible.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for basic/not over the top photography.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Bradshaw
Reviews.Content: Good camera. Easy to use. I would recommend buying a memory card to post pics. online. Photo quality is alright. Not the greatest, but fine for Facebook post. Overall, this is a good camera for taking pictures. If you are looking for a camera to do amazing photography, you should invest in something more advanced. Depends on what your needs are. For me, it's a keeper.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Theodore J. Jackson Sr.
Reviews.Content: I am a novice when it comes to cameras but this camera is very easy to operate for pictures or videos. My son knocked it out of my hands at Thanksgiving and it hit the floor hard causing the lens tube to sag when it comes out now. Still works though so I'm going to keep using it. :-)

Reviews.Title: kodak C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: sglicks
Reviews.Content: Camera was well worth the money. Uses 2 AA batteries. Had several Kodak point and shoot cameras. Easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the non-Photographer
Reviews.Author: Shallin
Reviews.Content: So far, we love this camera.  It takes great pictures for me, and I have zero photography skills.  Like our previous model, the door over the batteries and SD card seems like it'll give out before too many years, but I'm not opposed to taping it shut if that happens before we're ready for a new camera anyway.  Our last Kodak easyshare lasted several years even with a LOT of abuse from our now 3 year old.  I'm too practical to care, but we've gotten several comments on how pretty the camera itself is, too (I chose the white one).

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Karen Bowe
Reviews.Content: Camer is great for a pre-teen and she is looking forward to the camera, although the Kindle fire also has one and is better then the camera it self.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare Camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Tribe
Reviews.Content: I like the large viewing window, but it's taking time to get used to the camera.  It takes very good pictures and is easy to transfer to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Amazing and Very good One
Reviews.Author: Madhan Kumar
Reviews.Content: its an amazing product. all my friends enjoyed with this Camera. its very nice to carry and Resolution is very good.

Reviews.Title: C1530 Digital Camera - Works very well for quick and easy use.  Nice picture quality.
Reviews.Author: Jason Gaffke "MuskieJ"
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the camera.  Needed a camera that was easy to use, durable, took quick and nice pictures.  To my surprise the night photos were excellent.  Took pictures hunting of my son's first deer in pitch black forest conditions and had the forest light up like it was 4 pm.  Picture quality was better than any smart phone photo I've seen.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera, very small and compact, easy to use. Good price for a good camera, I thought it should have come with a CD for installation of software but in todays world, everything is downloadable.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: BLaid
Reviews.Content: This works for me to drag around and take pictures wherever I am. This simple camera takes great shots and I love the landscape mode!  It's nothing fancy but great for everyday shots!

Reviews.Title: Great camera !!
Reviews.Author: Dawn Bredo
Reviews.Content: It is simple and easy to use digital camera.  It is a shame Kodak will no longer be in the camera game.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Diana C. Matter
Reviews.Content: Really good little camera but doesn't always show true color, especially if the color is very bright. Other than that, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Susan C Leffler
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera, I'm thinking of purchasing another.  The only thing wrong was that the batteries that came with it only lasted 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: George Harman
Reviews.Content: Very good,economical camera takes great, high quality pictures and even has facial recognition. For the money it cant be beat. Buy it

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: michelle pulaski
Reviews.Content: Great brand of camera for a great price :) and was the great xmas gift my husband could ask for and he enjoys it as much as I do

Reviews.Title: Great for me because I'm an amateur
Reviews.Author: Gail Galusha
Reviews.Content: I like the size and the heft of this camera. It is small but sturdy. Takes pics without log delays between snaps. Love the color!

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera (White)
Reviews.Author: Mia
Reviews.Content: I bought  this for my daughters seventh birthday. She loves it! Batteries last! Pictures are perfect! She also took about 5 different videos some lasting as long as 14min. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great for grandmother
Reviews.Author: J. Luterek
Reviews.Content: This camera was a good choice for my camera given the simplicity and because it uses AA batteries.  Although most people have become accustomed to carrying around charging cables and planning ahead for taking photos, I think the ease of just buying a couple of AA batteries is simpler and more consistent.  Kodak has always been a good brand so I was surprised by the low price, but it doesn't skimp on quality.

Reviews.Title: It's a very good product
Reviews.Author: Yoryi
Reviews.Content: Of course it's not a professional one, but for me, just to take pictures of my family, trips, (daily use) is more than perfect.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift for my bright 6-year old - loved it.
Reviews.Author: Big Daddy
Reviews.Content: After looking at kid cameras that were essentially toys for $30-40, I decided to pay a few more bucks and get a real camera. She absolutely loved the camera.  It's simple enough for a kid to use the basic functions.  No, she doesn't change filters, use the timer, etc., but she is learning more every day.  I paid 3X this much for a camera with less features just five years ago.  For the money, this is a good little camera.

Reviews.Title: best point and click for the dollar
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: Video and Pictures are great quality. Even up to poster size. Camera is easy to use and set up and is tough as nails. I bought the drop and spill warranty but I highly doubt I'll need it. Only draw back on this camera is you can't hear the audio when playing back the recorded videos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony Chitwood "Emeriz"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it and it takes decent pictures.  For the price you really can't beat the camera, particularly for a first camera.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Wallace
Reviews.Content: This camera meets my expectations.  I can use it well in my business.  Kodak cameras last through about 2000 photos.  After that, it is time for a new camera.

Reviews.Title: First digital camera
Reviews.Author: Alecia
Reviews.Content: this is my first digital camera so I wanted something easy to use that wasn't expensive.  I love this camera, I find it easy to use and the pictures are very good.  All my friends have been surprised that the pictures are as good as their more expensive cameras.  I would buy this camera again

Reviews.Title: small camera big performance
Reviews.Author: candida pender
Reviews.Content: it is the small size that gives great performace.has lots of options that make picture taking fun.not very much weight.very easy to carry in pocket or purse to catch those specials moments.

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: Andia Jones
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures.clear pictures.love it!!!!!!.easy  to work and great instructions.can not wait to use it for my vacation in dec

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: sammy torrence
Reviews.Content: Great product, for a really great price. The camera took great picture,  which now I have great memories. Thank you for your service.

Reviews.Title: Love my New Camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Takes clear pictures, easy to download to your computer and love to share them directly from the camera. Great Color too!

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Meranix Herrera
Reviews.Content: I do not speak good English but I'll try, excellent product, everything arrived on time, the camera is good quality, I recommend

Reviews.Title: easy to us...
Reviews.Author: B. pogue "jude388"
Reviews.Content: easy to use, but seems to eat batteries, haven't had it long enough to really evaluate well, but its inexpensive and well worth the money....

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Fit in the palm of your hand. Take great picture, nice zoom. Would buy again if needed another camera. Have had it for 3 months took it on vacation was easy to remove card and download pictures. One complainant no software to hookup camera to computer need computer with a card reader or a card reader hookup for your computer. my laptop came with a card reader or I would have give it lower stars.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Lindsy Twitchell
Reviews.Content: Great camera I have had no problems with it small enough to put I'm your pocket takes great pictures. Would buy again

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Edwin Clifton
Reviews.Content: we wanted a good point and shoot camera , and this one fit the bill . easy to use and share .

Reviews.Title: This is a Great Item
Reviews.Author: Virginina Arnold
Reviews.Content: We ordered this item just before we took a vacation in Alaska...it took excellent pictures which we loaded onto our computer in the form of a slideshow that faded in & out...BEAUTIFUL PIX...

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: Works great. easy to set up. easy to take pictures from card to computer. Took a bunch of pictures in both the light and dark. Very easy to use.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Lindsay Sheehan
Reviews.Content: I liked the fact of getting a camera with zoom. But I didn't like the fact that you couldn't hear the sound of the video until you put it on the computer.

Reviews.Title: Great general purpose camera
Reviews.Author: EzJoe
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my grand daughter along with a protective case and a sd memory card.  She has been happy with all items.

Reviews.Title: Low price and great quality
Reviews.Author: gilmoreb
Reviews.Content: My new camera is great....easy to use and it takes wonderful photos.  It was a breeze to set up and use from day one.Thanks Kodak!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: mark dale
Reviews.Content: This camera replaces an older one that we loved. It has the zoom and date stamp that we wanted and couldn't find in more expensive brands.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: MrsBeck13
Reviews.Content: My son decided to use an amazon gift card he received for his birthday to purchase this camera. He's 11 and had $50, so we weren't expecting much- just something he could capture his point of view and have some fun with. This camera FAR exceeded our expectations. The pictures are surprisingly clear and it's easy to capture good shots. He loves the slow motion/ fast motion option on the video setting.Overall, a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: ~Miss~
Reviews.Content: This is by no means a super crazy expensive camera with amazing digital effects, but this camera does what I need it to and I would buy another if needed.

Reviews.Author: Sally
Reviews.Content: I just got my camera and going on Vac. to take picture of a new granddaughter I put in a SD card and how it won't stay on  I'm taking more batteries so may be I will get some picture I will be gone until the 4 of Nov and it may be to late to sent it back and don't have time to sent this one and and get another one in time.

Reviews.Title: I love it so much. Money well spent
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality pictures and videos. This was definitely a bargain and I'm a satisfied customer. I would recommend to anyone who needs a basic camera.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Vieira
Reviews.Content: The Kodak C1530 Camera has everything that more expensive cameras in the same category have. It works beautifully. The camera arrived on time and well packaged. Not sorry I bought it. The price was reasonable. Thanks

Reviews.Title: kodak camera customer
Reviews.Author: T Brown
Reviews.Content: it's great, I have  brought several kodak cameras, each one has been better than the last. sorry to hear about their camera products cease soon.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: stewarti
Reviews.Content: Small and unique and fits in my laptop bag very easily. It Takes very lovely pictures so i can share with friends and family

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my 6 year old grandson. He developed an interest in taking pictures and we wanted something he could use other than our camera. We gave it to him for a trip to Colorado. He took some excellent photos.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: debby dunn
Reviews.Content: gave as gift and she loved it. sure easy to work  and had everything she needed to use it and upload photos

Reviews.Title: not too impressed
Reviews.Author: shopper mom
Reviews.Content: I used to own a very similar kodak about 6 yrs ago and I loved that one. This one does not have very good picture quality especially if it is not bright and sunny out. I would not recommend getting this camera at all.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: Kiara
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera so I could show a client, who lives in Guatemala, any materials, colors, finishes and furniture I chose for the project i'm building for him (i'm an architect) here in Santo Domingo. This camera was extremely inexpensive (about USD50 including case and international courier), and has great resolution; I'm even using it in the minimum, because it's plenty for anyone's needs!

Reviews.Title: Good dependable camera
Reviews.Author: Mr.Frost
Reviews.Content: We purchased a lot of point and shoot cameras for the crew to take pics of their jobs .... These little guys are reasonable price and take good pics and are tough ..... Good buy!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: r
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace 10 year old hp 2.2 pixel camera. 6 weeks and nothing but great pics of my family and pets. Easy to use, compact, and almost unlimited storage, with sd card. Perfect for capturing pics indoors or out. Cannot speak on videos, purchased only for pictures. Will enjoy upcoming hollidays clicking away.

Reviews.Title: I can't hear any sound!
Reviews.Author: Brody
Reviews.Content: Its a good camera for the price but I cant hear any sound in my videos. Ive checked the kodak website and tried to figure out how to fix this problem and nothing...very annoyed seems theres a defect!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nin
Reviews.Content: Lightweight and perfect in every aspect. Excellent seller, just as described and very affordable. Takes great pictures too!! Easy to start using all but right out of box!! Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Digital Camera (White)
Reviews.Author: Forever3and88
Reviews.Content: Considering that I went from a Kodak with 28 zoom lens to this the pictures are near as clear but it is light weigh and easier to carry than the large one.  It will do what I need it for.

Reviews.Title: purchase of  kodak camera
Reviews.Author: michelle d
Reviews.Content: this was the best purchase i ever made in a long time. i was a little disappointed when i saw it was battery operated when i use it now i forget  its battery operated

Reviews.Title: Excellent for what it is
Reviews.Author: Madscientist "lcjr2002"
Reviews.Content: I knew going into this purchase that this point and shoot is considered low end. However, the quality of the pictures is infinitely better than any of the smartphone cameras. My expectation was that I needed picture quality that was better than smartphones Samsung, Google, Apple iphones, etc. This camera exceeded my expectations in that regard. The camera produces excellent quality pictures when there is sufficient lighting. It is small and easily fits in a pocket. It uses AA batteries. I use Amazon branded rechargeable batteries and I got 384 pictures on one charge with low utilization of flash. The images are crisp and look great on a high definition display. I have done side by side comparison with the same pictures taken under the same conditions with an iphone 5, a Samsung Galaxy S4 and this camera. There is no comparison. This camera produces much, much better pictures. I bought this camera to use in my lab to take pictures of electronic components. The quality has to be enough to expose some of the details. That's the reason I needed something better than a smartphone camera.For under $50, this camera is a good value. It works best as a secondary "disposable" camera. There many situations and places where you don't want to take your expensive DSLR camera and you still would like to have better picture quality than what a smart phone can produce. That's when this camera comes in. It also makes a very good camera to give to your kids. Additionally, if you are selling online and need to take pictures of the items you are selling, that would be another excellent use of this camera. Or if you are in real estate and need to take pictures of properties. Overall, a very good general purpose camera. For the money you can't go wrong and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my sister.
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister because she's been wanting a camera for a veryyyy long time. My friend actually bought one and when it came I saw that it was a decent camera. I placed an ordered and sent it as a gift to my sister. She's been using the camera everyday now and has told me it works very well so far.

Reviews.Title: Bargain for the buck !!!
Reviews.Author: Home Improvement Contractor
Reviews.Content: We (my company) have been using this model for some time. We are a construction company and we need to document a lot. They are durable and last the beatings we give them. Try and find a better priced camera thats durable . Good luck. Its a great price for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: lymemommy
Reviews.Content: Ordered for my son's birthday and when it arrived it would not turn on.Looked nice otherwise but we returned it and ordered a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Marcelo Barreto
Reviews.Content: I've just take some photos but I think that its a very good camera. The photos have good quality and the camera is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: THIN MAN
Reviews.Content: kodak is discontinuing this item i believe. Dosen't matter,for less than $50.00,a deal. does everything my daughter's Canon does. if you need an inexpensive point & shoot,you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy Hein
Reviews.Content: A good buy for someone like me who doesn't know anything about digital photography, or even if she'll use the camera much.  I had no problem downloading photos using the USB cable provided, but I'm running Vista.  I also read the extended user guide.  If you're not using Kodak's software, you should change the default software setting on the camera's settings menu from "Kodak" to "Other."  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I have no point of comparison.

Reviews.Title: Very dependable
Reviews.Author: Pamela G. Vernon "golfngalpam"
Reviews.Content: I really love this small but great picture taking camera. It will fit in my smallest handbag or golf bag or great for the pooll/beachbag. Love it-love it!

Reviews.Title: NO disc included or online download not available on www.Kodak to get pics to computer
Reviews.Author: pen name
Reviews.Content: I would have given 4 or 5 stars, but there was no disc in box to make camera connect to computer to get pics off of it, and www.kodak says the download is no longer available...so I have to manually put the SD Card in my computers hard drive to get pics off the camera, when I usually like to plug the camera in by the cord. I had to monkey around with that and then had my husband try computer savvy husband try too, and we gave up. I had a few auto focus blurry shots--but did ok on hiking trip and cave hike with decent flash. Photos good for a cheap decent/camera that I don't mind losing or breaking.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: P. Hustead "Theta's mom"
Reviews.Content: Sweet little camera for the price point.  Now you will not be selling any pics to the major magazines but the pictures are quite nice, the camera is easy to operate and set up.  It is light to hold and works on regular batteries. If you run out, you can get those anywhere....big bonus...no having to look for special batteries.  Been there, done that - so wrong. Will not ever, and I said EVER, purchase a camera again that requires special batteries. The pics are quick to load to a printer because they do not require a lot of megapixels so it will not take a long time to print / tie up the printer if several people use it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share
Reviews.Author: nkreis
Reviews.Content: Love this camera because it takes regular batteries. In my line of work we need pictures of all our jobs and having a camera that doesn't need to be charged is awesome. All I have to do is make sure my crews have batteries and we are in business.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Craig Alessi
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the money. Easy to operate. I bought this for my wife and she is not that good with electronics but loves this camers.

Reviews.Title: C1530 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Joan Cominotti
Reviews.Content: I had trouble putting the pictures on my computer but I purchased a card reader so my problem was solved.

Reviews.Title: Easy and Fun
Reviews.Author: Bread Woman "Dottie"
Reviews.Content: Undoubtedly easy to operate.  Excellent pictures.  Just sad that Kodak is going out of business as this product works just exactly as described.  In expensive and great gift for someone who just wants good pictures to load on the social network.  Very Pleased

Reviews.Title: A few problems
Reviews.Author: Bea G Zienkosky
Reviews.Content: I was given good customer service. When I complained about the 19.98 shipping charge I was charged for, and not aware of, it was immediately removed from my account. I like the camera so far but am still learning how to use it. I was disappointed it did not come with a memory card. I had to go out and look for one before I could take any pictures. I think things like no memory card or what ever is not included,  should be stressed on any orders especially when you buy a camera. You want to take it out and start taking pictures right away . Unfortunately, I missed some good photos at my birthday lunch because I didn't have a camera. Otherwise, I believe I will get a lot of fun out of it on other occasions.I would buy from this company again, but would want to know what is not standard with what ever I would buy.. I would have given it a 5 star except for that. Bea

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: T. B. Robinson "Toni Bonita"
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera as a gift to my sister  she loves it.  She was thrilled to  take pictures at her class reunion.

Reviews.Title: small compact takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This small compact camera is perfect to fit in a purse or jeans pocket making it ready to use at all times. Pictures are crisp and clear. Wish the zoom was better. Would recommend for a simple easy camera for children and adults alike.

Reviews.Title: Get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Everything works as well as I wanted it to work. However, I was a little mislead by the whole send pictures to your email thing but it's no real problem. Also, the "OK" and navigation buttons are a little lose, but as long as they work it's okay.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: Linda & James
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my kid and she's been using it all summer with no problem. It's worth the price and it actually takes good pictures/videos.

Reviews.Title: totally worth the money!!
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother in law and it works great so far. She absolutely loves it. It takes out clean pictures and has some cool features like tagging the person in the picture with their name and whatever else you might want to add. I myself am thinking of ordering one, since my camera's starting to malfunction a bit.

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest, but you get what you pay
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our 3 year old daughter so I wasn't expecting much. The first one we got was broken. The lense-cap would not slide off. We returned it and bought a new one.This one works great, she can use it. It does chew through batteries though, so get sure you have rechargeable batteries on hand.

Reviews.Title: A six year old has no trouble using this camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera for my six year old niece who has had no experience with cameras.  Within minutes she was taking and reviewing pictures.  The price and ease of use were the reasons I chose this camera

Reviews.Title: great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B. Schackart "retired cop"
Reviews.Content: not a super high end camera, but one that will take good pics at the beach, car shoes,  family events

Reviews.Title: GET THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Sikeya Hawkins-Moore
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect camera for people who use a camera on a daily basis, the battery life (double AA) is amazing. I love Kodak and they  have out done themselves with this one.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Red Alert
Reviews.Content: great value and price will purchase additional.  bought for work and gave out to techs and quality was so good will purchase for personal use

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I needed a small point and shoot digital camera as lugging a big SLR wasn't an option, I came across this Kodak EasyShare digital camera here on Amazon and it was less money than I was planning on spending, however it had all of the features that I needed that some of the more expensive cameras didn't have. It takes very nice clean, clear pictures! I don't know how they can sell quality like this for so little money but I suggest you grab one or even 2 of them before the price jumps way up!

Reviews.Title: camera doesn't work
Reviews.Author: lily dwyer
Reviews.Content: there was some problem with the lense; it would move in and out with no reason.  i had a hard time getting the lense to retract so i could return the camera in the box it came in.  just a lemon maybe.  i've loved all my kodaks before because they are simple and take great pictures.  i always carried mine in my purse.  never got the software to work though.

Reviews.Title: So nice I bought one for myself and my daughter!
Reviews.Author: Steph "Searching for Answers in Autism"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for two years and it's still going strong. I even bought one for my daughter because it was reasonably price and durable.

Reviews.Title: great excelent camera
Reviews.Author: marcial ciprian
Reviews.Content: this camera is one of the best i ever had, it have great quality pic and video, is great to hold

Reviews.Title: I named it Little Red II
Reviews.Author: karen s. petrelli
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I had Little Red I but she drowned in ginger ale and I was very depressed.  It's easy to use and takes absolutely wonderful pictures.  I carry it with me to any and all events.  Batteries last quite a while as well.  Easy to download and share all pictures.

Reviews.Title: A handy little camera
Reviews.Author: candydar
Reviews.Content: It is different from my previous Kodak camera and I am still learning.  The pictures are sharp and easy to take.

Reviews.Title: No software
Reviews.Author: Paulette M. Keswick
Reviews.Content: This unit is no longer supported by Kodak for the Sharing software. Does not even let you download the old version.

Reviews.Title: very sleek
Reviews.Author: ISANDY
Reviews.Content: This cameria is ideal for vacations. it is very small and can fit in your pocket. It takes great pictures and is very operating friendly

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: kelly walker
Reviews.Content: bought this for my nephew, other than not having the greatest zoom, it's easy to use and works great for a child or person who wants to take pics.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Trisha Goodrich
Reviews.Content: Bought a lesser brand for my sisters baby shower that took blurry pics. For just a few dollars more I ordered her this one. It came right on time and was exactly like the picture. Takes great pics of kids which is exactly what we were looking for. Great point and shoot! Easy to set up. Perfect for anyones first camera.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Jan L Leidy
Reviews.Content: Thisv is a great value for a point and shop camera. It is easy to use and takes quality pics.

Reviews.Title: instructions for operating camera
Reviews.Author: Deanna Jodun
Reviews.Content: the only thing i didn't care for was the directions for operating the camera. they were not very good. I have never owned one of these cameras before and I need better instructions.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, even though it is small. It takes better pictures  than my more expensive 16 m-pixel  camera. I print out sharp looking 8x10's and everyone is impressed with them...

Reviews.Title: a great camera
Reviews.Author: K. Ballard "baby boomer"
Reviews.Content: this Kodak takes pictures as well as camera's that cost three times as much. the ease of handling of the Kodak was exceptional. if your looking for a camera that will hold up through the years this product is for you

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Muhammed
Reviews.Content: It is just awesome, new, and excellent. On time as well. Thanks very much. I appreciate your honesty. wish you all the best.

Reviews.Title: Camera works like a cheap dollar store camera
Reviews.Author: Karen "Karen of Northern Michigan"
Reviews.Content: I've been using a Kodak C310 digital camera for the last 8 years and love it.. I thought I'd buy another easy share before it's too late since Kodak is discontinuing digital camera's.. Boy was I disappointed in this camera.. The camera itself is very attractive, easy to hold and easy to take pictures, which is why I gave it a 1 instead of 0.. But the pictures turn out horrible.. I tried using this to take pictures of dolls to add to my website. No matter what setting I used, with or without the flash, any design in the fabric came out all squiggly and the doll's hair came out looking "shimmery". This is something I used to deal with 12 years ago with the earliest digital cameras.. It certainly isn't something I expected to see from new camera purchased in 2013.. I requested a return, but then played around with it thinking maybe I just needed to spend more time figuring it out, so I didn't return it.. That was a mistake.. I have put hours into this camera trying to get a good picture.. It's so iffy, you can take two pictures, one right after another, with the same setting. One will come out okay and the other will be all blurry.. you just can't depend on it to take good pictures..

Reviews.Title: New Kodak easy share camera
Reviews.Author: Judith Cole
Reviews.Content: I had a Kodak easy share for several years and dropped it on our vacation last week.  I liked it so much and couldn't find a new part. So I bought a new camera ,delivery was quick and I am happy with it

Reviews.Title: good camera but bad program
Reviews.Author: loliemargaret
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is easy to use and works well.  However, the Kodak program that comes with it that you would want to use for uploading to your pc or sharing is not functional, in fact won't even load. When I went on line to find out why, Kodak says that this program is no longer available for down load and "sorry for the inconvenience." But the problem can be bypassed by choosing a different "device" in the options that makes at least using the USB to load to your PC functional. I like the camera, but shame on Kodak for not telling you this up front. They even have a "note" inside that says, "don't return the camera please."

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Pat "Pat S"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kodak because I had one before and liked it.  Unfortunately, Kodak went out of business a couple of years ago so when I experienced software problems with this camera, they told me that the software was no longer available and sorry for the inconvenience.  Take it from me, I never expected a brand new camera to have a problem but it did and there was no one there to help.  I have since returned it and am going with a camera from a company that is still in business!!  Thanks Amazon for making this process of returning it tolerable.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C1530 Camera
Reviews.Author: genel64
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and has lots of options.  Just plug the usb into your computer and it downloads your pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne Ritter "Art Design Fabricator"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my Grandson.  It's just the right size for him.  I tested it (it's a gift) and it looks like it will fill his first camera  to a tee.  I picked the white one because he loves my white camera.  The pictures are crisp and the camera is easy to use.  Shipping was quick and right on time and in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: My third purchase
Reviews.Author: Wendie Vanderwater
Reviews.Content: I have purchased three of these cameras, one for myself and two for grandsons.  I like it because it is easy to operate and makes loading pictures on Facebook very simple.  I would recommend this camera to anyone who has difficulty with the new mechanical products.  This is very straightforward and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son to take to boy scout camp.  It was easy for him to use and he was able to get great pictures from it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak camera
Reviews.Author: kristy d
Reviews.Content: Was very good. Might be buying a second on. This one was for mother in law who doesn't know how to work anything electronic. Was very easy to use. A simple point and shoot. Showed up on time. Got case and scan disk recamended and worked very well as a birthday gift. Took great pictures. Very good for price compair to my Nikon s6500 that just got washed out by ocean. So I might be buying this one for me.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Easy to use  great pictures.  For the price i paid I didn't think I would get such a great camera

Reviews.Title: Exceptional quality
Reviews.Author: Christina McMasters
Reviews.Content: Better than I expected, especially for the cost. It takes great pictures in low light, bright light, far distances and true to life colors.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: imad nowar
Reviews.Content: I like the camera but I dont know how to do the share button can someone tell me in steps

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Lynden Jones
Reviews.Content: Love the little camera, purchased for our pack trip and it worked great!  The only issue is trying to download the pictures onto the computer.  It wouldn't work, finally we put the SD card into another camera and downloaded the pictures that way.  Simple solution ;)

Reviews.Title: This camera is just right!
Reviews.Author: Victor M.
Reviews.Content: I really needed a camera that would take up close pictures of my chainmail pieces inspired by Scripture. And so far it is doing an amazing job. I have only taken a few, but the detail is super! The Kodak software did not function on the Windows 8 operating system, the install window was just frozen, not doing what it should, installing the software. However, when I unplugged the camera from its USB cord, on the screen of the camera was an option to use another program to download the picture's to my laptop. I simply chose to use another program, plugged it back into the USB jack turned it back on and a screen popped up  with a selection of available programs on my computer, I chose windows photo gallery and it works beautifully! Thank you for the super fast shipping!

Reviews.Title: Kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Ned
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter "lost" her first Kodak in the bathtub. She did not want any other camera but Kodak C1530. Price was the best I could find. Servise and shipping, great.

Reviews.Title: Great Kodak
Reviews.Author: Andrew Barbey
Reviews.Content: Take great pictures, Can do great closeup pictures. Easy to use.Nice Chooses of colores of the Camera. Good size to put your purse or pants

Reviews.Title: kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Torielom
Reviews.Content: , third one I've had and like they way they work.  Sorry to here they will be discontinued. Easy to use and good pictures and videos

Reviews.Title: easy share
Reviews.Author: okie joan
Reviews.Content: this is the second one I have owned. I love these cameras. they are so easy to use so easy to download pictures and really good pictures too

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and use!
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Henkel
Reviews.Content: I received this camera within 2 days which was perfect timing for the local car race I was going to.  In no time I had the camera setup to what I needed and ready to go take pictures.  It is also nice to clearly see the see the picture on the camera viewer.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: mary lafleur
Reviews.Content: with a new born in the house now I use this Camera often. It is well worth the money. I tell all the mothers and daycare and three of them just got the same camera. It was priced great and the pics. look just as good as my sister in laws pricey camera

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Aunt. B.
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price, easy to use and takes great pictures.  Lots of features, perfect for the casual photographer.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tammy Knight
Reviews.Content: Mother was looking for a good Camera easy to operate and Big screen, Good Mega PixlThis has everything she needed and it was at a great price.It will be a Happy Birthday!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera (C1530)
Reviews.Author: Christel Thimm
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my Kodak C1530 camera.  It makes great pictures and I am enjoying the pics I make.

Reviews.Title: not too happy
Reviews.Author: jenni jaime
Reviews.Content: iwas not really hapy with this camera,,,it would not charge prperly,,i had to order another camera...and this oneis not working properly either...

Reviews.Title: My Kodachrome
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: I hsve been looking for a simple easy to use camera. I've finally bought it and I love it! Great value for its price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Carolyn L. Velando "CAROLYN WON"
Reviews.Content: I had bought one years ago and it recently was stolen. I bought another camera in my travels and I don't like it as well. This camera is easier to use, I replaced it and I am happy now.

Reviews.Title: Cute lil' thang
Reviews.Author: Heather Jameson
Reviews.Content: This camera is good. Just what you need for simple shots of friends. It's nothing professional, but it's still a good camera for those who don't really NEED a camera but find uses for them once in a while.

Reviews.Title: greatest camera ever had
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Hoffee "Gene Hoffee"
Reviews.Content: this camera takes the most wonderful pictures ive ever seen for its price. Buy this camera u wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: GloGarz
Reviews.Content: I love my little camera. It takes crisp clear pictures with no problem at all...My only problem is, I misplaced it. I know it's in the house but I can't find it...sigh!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: D. King
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  It has lots of features and is 14 megapixel.  Takes much better photos than my phone!  It's so easy to use too.  The price is fantastic.  Would make a really elegant stocking stuffer!

Reviews.Title: General Review
Reviews.Author: Student Review
Reviews.Content: I love this product! For the price its a real bargain. Takes great photos and video. Cant go wrong for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Joan Sussman
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera...easy to use and was exactly as described... arrived quickly and I was able to obtain additional instructions on line

Reviews.Title: Excellent - camera
Reviews.Author: amasom
Reviews.Content: Excellent - camera - photo quality is too good although I tried a few ones. Recommend to buy. Color and texture is also fine.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: batemanj
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed this camera and for the price, it is doing everything it says it would.  It was easy to learn to use and we were ready to shoot photos practically right out of the box.  You absolutely MUST have a memory card, though.  We took about six pictures without a memory card and the memory on the camera was full.  This is an extra expense...but still glad we purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, and simple to use!
Reviews.Author: Jhenabee
Reviews.Content: I bought this camra for my mother who has fallen behind in our now high tech world. This camra is perfect for her, so easy to use! I would recomend for anyone but ecpes. For those that are looking for simplicity, ease of use and great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new camera
Reviews.Author: Lady zenomi "zenomi"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my kodak camera its my first in this brand strongly recommended by my brother so I decided to give it a go the price was excellent and the quality pictures are amazing would recommend to anyone who wants a point and shoot that delivers quality pics.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Rational Shopper, Ph.D. "Rational shopper, Ph.D."
Reviews.Content: This is a newer model with very few reviews.  We've had the camera for two weeks.  Very simple to use, and no problems yet. . . . to be continued.

Reviews.Title: Why does everyone say they wish they could give this zero stars?
Reviews.Author: Brent Dunaway "bnduny"
Reviews.Content: One star means we/you/I hated it, and we did. We used it for two or three days and then it stopped working. It was never dropped, soaked, stepped on or abused and the screen went purple and it would not take pictures. We tried to reset it by taking out batteries and holding on/off keys and nothing helped. We liked the price but no matter how cheap I am, I always seem to relearn the lesson of you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: Richard Goldstein
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my grandson on Oct 25th and on Jan20th it stopped working. It won't startup even with new batteries. It is not replaceable and I'm very unhappy.

Reviews.Title: NOT A GOOD DEAL
Reviews.Author: Sally Horton
Reviews.Content: IT ATE BATTERIES AND THEN IT DESTROYED THE PICTURE CARD, WOULDN'T DOWNLOAD DIRECTLY TO MY COMPUTER OR SET UP THE SOFTWARE ON MY COMPUTER AND HAD NO TECH SUPPORT

Reviews.Title: Like the Kodak point and shoot digital cameras!
Reviews.Author: Nodak chic
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 6 yrs old daughter's first digital camera and I find myself grabbing it too.  Nice price and quality in a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but no memory card!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Nelson
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive, easy to use point and shoot camera that took good pictures.The picture quality is good. I point and shoot and that was what I wanted. My only problem is that it does not come with a memory card, and has a very small amount of internal memory. So I had to buy a card AFTER finally getting the camera, and that was a bit frustrating. Memory cards can cost from $10-$100 depending on the size, so you need to add that to your cost. I got a 6 GB card for $12.Also I like the color. To be honest, that is what caught my eye and made me purchase this camera over others.

Reviews.Title: my previous Kodak EasyShare was better
Reviews.Author: Bevanurse2u "bevanurse"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't load up pictures and when i tried to contact Kodak I was directed to a website that was of no help. I finally ended up sending it back.

Reviews.Title: the software used to install the data for this camera is discontinued so i cant take pictures off camara to put on the computer!
Reviews.Author: Christin
Reviews.Content: The software used to transfer pics from camera to computer is outdated I bought the camera for business purposes and I have all my pics for work and I can't upload them now to use them for work! So I wasted time and money on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Program would NOT load in 3 different PCs!
Reviews.Author: LINDA H ANDERSON
Reviews.Content: Number one, Kodak is going out of business and maybe buyers will not be able to get parts after a while.There was NO card that came with it, one had to be purchased.. No wonder I thought it was such a great deal at 1st.It has been returned, my money promptly refunded.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: sherry
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace my other camera. I use this one for downloading pictures to the computer.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend. The toll free hotline for tech support from ...
Reviews.Author: Minerva Rodriguez "MinRod60"
Reviews.Content: I purchase 2 of these and neither one worked.  Would not recommend. The toll free hotline for tech support from Kodak charges you to fix any problems with the camera. Not worth the bother.

Reviews.Title: didn't recieve all it was supposed to include
Reviews.Author: Marybeth Norton
Reviews.Content: Camera came with dead batteries that wouldnt hold a charge & the battery charger was missing. Thankfully I already had one.

Reviews.Title: WHY WALK AWAY FROM THIS CAMERA WHEN YOU CAN RUN?
Reviews.Author: gopherprairieexile
Reviews.Content: I had the previous incarnation of this camera, and loved it, except that the battery door just refused to shut properly almost from jump, so I had to secure it with mailing tape, but after a little more than three years, it just went weird, lens zoomed out when you turned it on, then nothing else on the camera worked, screen dark, then the lens wouldn't go back in when you shut it off...I saw other people had these problems, but I figured, if the new one lasted three and a half years again before this stuff happened, I wouldn't complain. It happened after the first 30 pictures. I returned it; thank you Amazon, because Kodak was of NO help, the only clear information I got was that if I wanted any information, it would cost 20 bucks for the first three questions or some nonsense like that, despite the camera being about six weeks old, and I should have my credit card handy. DO NOT BUY THIS. Now I'm stuck without a camera for the holidays, because it's too hectic now to do the homework to buy a new one.

Reviews.Title: Useless!
Reviews.Author: K. Jackman
Reviews.Content: I couldn't transfer pictures to my computer because Kodak discontinued the Easy Share download necessary to do this!!! So this camera is useless.......I sent it back! What a pain in the *&^%$#

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Fiona FixMitchell
Reviews.Content: I don't like it as well as the older model because it doesn't have the rechargable battery and weighs more, but it takes nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Camera
Reviews.Author: stephen reynolds
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera to back up my Panasonic Lumix..This was a poor choice. Spend a little more money and get better quality. The electronics shut down or went into digital lines..useless.

Reviews.Title: what is the contact number that really works for warranty
Reviews.Author: Ken Walters
Reviews.Content: what is the contact number that really works for warrany....no numbers work....online chat doesn't work .what's going on. Was told this warranty was still going to be good one year

Reviews.Title: Not as I was expected
Reviews.Author: Samuel Reyes
Reviews.Content: This camera is an average item. I don't like that I need to have a sotfware to use it. It's not enougth strong.

Reviews.Title: Enforcement Photos
Reviews.Author: L. Melendez
Reviews.Content: Took an chance on this camera based on specs.  Did not disappoint.  Ordered several more cameras for our Enforcement team.  takes great pics day or night and easy upload to computer.  Says it e-mails photos put once you connect it and download software it's a different story.  Takes nice clear photos though.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: K. Leach
Reviews.Content: Shipping was perfect, but I purchased this camera because I accidently broke my first camera during my nephew's High School graduation. You get what you pay for.....this camera is typical and basic. I'm unable to play previous recorded video's saved on my memory card on this camera.

Reviews.Title: no battery life
Reviews.Author: Peb50
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just before going on a trip out of country and took extra batteries with me. I rapidly used all the batteries I had brought and then had to constantly buy additional ones as well. It was very aggravating to try to take pictures and have the camera turn off on me constantly. The pictures I did get to take seemed to be of good quality on the screen but the battery issue was aggravating. Now that I am home, I will have to go buy even more batteries to be able to access my pictures since the batteries are apparently now completely dead after my flight back. And yes I did have the camera shut down.

Reviews.Title: Not expensive, good for basics
Reviews.Author: keith
Reviews.Content: The camera came in a timely fashion, right in time for vacation.  Easy to use, good quality pictures.  A fun little camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: dlmar10
Reviews.Content: Shipment arrived 1 day early.  This camera is everything and so much more.  Price was excellent and well worth it.  Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: So thankful
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: So thankful for this camera - in total love w it!!! Wouldn't trade it for anything keeping it in a case a all times love it

Reviews.Title: Loved the red camera
Reviews.Author: Amelia johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought his camera for my cousin. I really appreciate the fact that the camera was delivered right to be taken to him in Haiti.

Reviews.Title: Nice and lovely-easy to work on it-nice colour-not very expensive-
Reviews.Author: L. Bax De Keating
Reviews.Content: to transfer pictures to FaceBook & Twitter, l could not unstall the software, because no Software was received, except the cord. .

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Chris Johnson
Reviews.Content: Over all its about the same as the camera I was replacing, but I was disappointed to find out after I received it, that it operated on regular batteries and not rechargeable permanent.

Reviews.Title: Okay for the price (good)
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: it's worth it although it has cheap quality and that is the bad thing and you cant zoom in that much but then when you take a picture its really nice and its not blurry and you can choose what type of picture you want

Reviews.Title: It does not have 720P HD video
Reviews.Author: Vijay Saran
Reviews.Content: I am surprised that the specs mention 720P HD but I received the camera today & the max video res is 640 x 480 only!!!

Reviews.Title: KOTAK 1530
Reviews.Author: mopman
Reviews.Content: i HAD A 16 MP KODAK BEFORE BUT THIS IS GOOD. BUT I WOULD LIKE A 16 MP KODAK CAMERA...

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare C1530 14 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red)
Reviews.Author: kath
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent easy to use camera for which we now have bought two in my family! The pictures come out beautiful and if you do not have experience picture taking, or just want a camera to share pictures on the internet this is the one. Kodak is discontinuing their production, but they make an excellent camera!  Only issue I had was with the Seller!  The used camera was in mint condition as described but how it was packaged and sent was extremely poorly done.  There was no care in wrapping each piece to prevent damage inside the box, as it rattled and rolled to my post office box.  Thus the Camera is excellent but I would not go back to the Seller for other items for fear that they would be broken before arriving to their destination!

Reviews.Title: disgusting camera
Reviews.Author: Martin ma
Reviews.Content: only can store 5 photos. not 14MP. no charging. the worst purchase i have ever made. it is not recommended.

Reviews.Title: such a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Summer
Reviews.Content: i got this cam because i needed one to take photos of my work for my portfolio.... my phone didnt take good enough pics....  but.. i cant even get the driver to install on my computer so i can even get the pics off of it... and you cant "share" photos unless the driver is installed.. and in its OS list... it goes no higher than vista... UHHGGGG so freaking frustrated.. and i cant find the software online... only updates for it.. i wish i never got this thing...

Reviews.Title: fuzzy pictures
Reviews.Author: iris "garden gal"
Reviews.Content: This camera is hard to use.Markings on settings, even the on/off switchare really dim.Pictures are fuzzy, no matter what distance.Don't bother with it.

Reviews.Title: Say cheese!
Reviews.Author: Sleeper "Sleeper"

} } } Length:: 3:09 MinsNice little camera. Bought it for my daughter, and we used it on our vacation to South Dakota. I was very pleased with the pictures the camera took, and also satisfied with the video and audio. We purchased an 8 GB Kingston flash card for the camera, which of course allows you store several hundred photos and made around a dozen short videos on our trip. The memory card is great, just pop it out of the camera and into my computer. I uploaded all photos and videos and put them on a DVD disc, so we could view our photos in our home theater.I had issues with trying to download pictures straight to the computer from the camera. Obviously a software issue. So I recommend getting a flash card. So much easier to work with, not to mention you don't have to worry about the number of photos you can take. It will hold a ton. If you're looking for an inexpensive point and shoot camera, I think this one is an excellent choice. I uploaded 5 photos from our South Dakota trip to give you an idea of the quality of photos this camera can take. Also made a home made video, showing quality of this $50 camera. Added a little 70's music to make it more interesting :) Thanks for looking.P.S. If you never been to the Badlands or Mt. Rushmore, highly recommend going and enjoying the beautiful sights and fresh air.

Reviews.Title: small, fits in shirt pocket, easy to use.  a real bargain
Reviews.Author: #1amazon
Reviews.Content: it is just a great camera.  you will love it.  easy to use.  small, and fits in shirt pocket, big screen and after loading with 16 gb, can take pictures forever.one other thing:  i recently purchased through you a pair of shoes and two shirts, can you email me a copy of that purchase.  i have to return the shoes to targets for a larger size and i believe they will need proof i purchased through amazon.  thank you.  i purchased them about a month ago, using visa last four 5471.  thanks

Reviews.Title: its way better than i expected
Reviews.Author: TaSharra
Reviews.Content: i like it. for the price im really happy. easy use and its red and pretty.  get for a present also. it came with sd card and batteries.

Reviews.Title: please credit my credit card and take this camera back
Reviews.Author: david emerson
Reviews.Content: it is run on batteries intend of a plug in charger,plus it doesn,t transfer pictures to my computor. I want to return it and get full credit on my credit card.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Sara Villagomez
Reviews.Content: This was a terrible waste of time and money. The camera's battery drained after being turned on for less than 15 minutes. The software downloaded to my computer, but the camera would not connect. THERE is NO tech support available as the company is going out of business. I returned it the same day I received it. AWFUL

Reviews.Title: Great pictures! Hate the batteries
Reviews.Author: Keebleflorb
Reviews.Content: I like the camera for the pictures but i HATE having to deal with dead batteries and not being able to charge it via a cable :( have had it for a wk and happy with the quality of pictures. If you like having a camera that can charge then don't purchase this camera,but if you dont mind then its a good price for  good pictures

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: phyllisl
Reviews.Content: ALTHOUGH I HAVE NOT HAD MY KODAK EASYSHARE FOR LONG, I HAVE FOUND ABSOLUTELY NO DIFFICULTY IN EITHER USING IT OR DOWNLOADING PICTURES.  I INITIALLY BOUGHT ONE FOR MY 10 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS BUT WHEN I SAW THE EASE WITH WHICH SHE USED IT, I BOUGHT ONE FOR MYSELF.

Reviews.Title: kodak camera
Reviews.Author: michelle fortune
Reviews.Content: it holds my camera just right!!! it truly was made for it. :) it protects my camera when it is not in use.

Reviews.Title: Simple, Efficient, Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: Simply put: this is a great kodak camera. After I inserted the New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!, I went to town with camera and I was really impressed with it. Not only can several photos, but the camera gives you a number of options to work with to make the images better. It's great, and it's simple to use. Can't go wrong there.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA OVERALL
Reviews.Author: Marty F
Reviews.Content: This is a nice product from Kodak. Makes you wonder why they decided to leave this area of production. However, with that being said, it does a very nice job. It takes very clear pictures and video, and the menu options are easy to use. The one thing it could have done is offer more internal memory, but that does not make it a bad product at all.  If you need a digital camera that will do a great job, with 14mp, then you should consider this item. You will be happy, I'm sure.

Reviews.Title: Very Disapointed !!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Camera does not work properly!  Does not detect. When I plug it in to CPU with a NEW USB cable it says processing & then turns off  !!!!! Junk!!

Reviews.Title: garbled audio
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "Samuel Langhorne Clemens (ghost)"
Reviews.Content: All the videos have garbled audio. Has anyone else experienced this or discovered a solution?  Also, the Sharebutton App no longer supports uploading to YouTube.edit: Though Windows Media Player garbles the audio, Nero Showtime plays it correctly.

Reviews.Title: Product was great
Reviews.Author: chris coward
Reviews.Content: Product was great. No online support though. HP Online does not support this camera again. Would not buy in the future though.

Reviews.Title: I just got camera but no manual
Reviews.Author: Sis
Reviews.Content: I just got my camera and was so disappointing that it didn't come with a complete extended users guide I have to go to kodak websight to look at it. I can't even call or talk to them because it's the weekend. I hope they will send me one. Plus the price was reduced after I purchased it, so annoying.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Cherrygirl
Reviews.Content: Sorry to say I am returning this product. Very little internal memory, 4 pictures worth, definitely need a memory card. Camera would not install Kodak Easy Share software on my computer.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: Thankachan Mathew "tmatsus"
Reviews.Content: I rate this product subpar because the product was faulty. Its on/off switch never worked right, I returned the product and the retailer immediately credited my account.

Reviews.Title: Camera Blues
Reviews.Author: Brenda A. Favors
Reviews.Content: My camera is okay, but I expected s better quality camera . But it's okay for what I paid.I am going  to actually purchse on

Reviews.Title: Wrong camera
Reviews.Author: guitar  JD "Jo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it was under water, as family had one shapped the same.  I must read all literature on product in future, sent back no problem with that.
